story:
What is the The 360° Approach?

The 360° Approach is a boutique personal training and fitness studio focusing on total body wellness.  360° takes a personalized approach to working with individuals and small groups, designing wellness plans that address fitness, nutrition and self-care.  360° also works in schools and churches to create wellness programs that build self-esteem and awaken self-awareness.

Who is The 360° Approach?

In 2013 Chan Little started The 360° Approach as a way to support individuals in achieving optimal health – no matter where they were on their journey.  Since its inception, The 360° Approach has developed a diverse clientele of professionals, athletes, students and retirees, providing clients with personalized fitness plans and nutrition coaching.  With more than 15 years of experience in health and wellness, Chan is a veteran of the U.S Air Force. In 2007 she joined the wellness team of the Durham YMCA and later became the Director of Wellness, serving a membership base of more than 12,000. In her role as Director of Wellness, she supported more than 60 part time group fitness instructors and personal trainers; coordinated more than 100 classes per week and managed community wellness programs that addressed obesity and chronic illness through nutrition, fitness and self-care. Under Chan’s leadership, The 360° Approach offers diverse group fitness classes, small group training, personal training and nutrition counseling by an equally diverse community of certified personal trainers and health professionals. 

Why 360°?

Each year, millions of people die from preventable deaths. A recent study showed that about half of all deaths in the United States were due mostly to preventable behaviors. Some of the leading causes included cardiovascular disease, chronic respiratory disease and diabetes. This same study estimates that over 400,000 people die each year in the United States due to poor diet and a sedentary lifestyle.

The 360° Approach recognizes the need for change and understands that optimal health is only achieved with self-awareness, support and proper balance. 360° supports individuals and communities through education, health promotion and support of non-clinical life choices, such as, eating nutritious meals and exercising daily, which both prevent disease and create a sense of overall well-being.

What we need?

For the past year, The 360° Approach has been operating without a place to truly call home. As our community continues to grow, so does the need for a dedicated studio space, conducive to creating and serving a diverse community of people.  The 360° Approach will be designed as a boutique studio, located in the heart of downtown Durham.  360° will offer an urban flare in a plush environment, with quality instructors, innovative training approaches and lively music.

Our goal of $37,959 has been properly calculated and will be used to renovate, equip, and furnish our space in Downtown Durham.

How you can help?

We believe there are a lot of people out there like us, who want to impact our community in a meaningful way. When we improve our quality of life and support others in doing so, we contribute to a healthier community in which we can all work and live. Make your best donation to the cause and we’ll offer you some pretty impressive perks in return.  THEN… tell all your friends about our project and how you’re helping to make Durham a healthier place to live by posting on Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites.  We can’t do this without you!  If you’re excited about what we’re doing in our community, please tell someone!Thanks in advance for your support.

story:
Help us help Quentin

**See below for updated info**

The office of Richard Di Natale (Greens spokesperson for health) has been liaising with the Health Department on behalf of Quentin, and have arranged for him to be given a Medicare Card, and all hospital expenses back-dated. This takes us almost entirely out of the woods for hospital bills. I will discuss with the hospital what fees we may still need to pay, I know ambulance and new glasses will be a part of it. We also want to replace the blood-stained clothes that they took from Quentin for evidence. We would like to use the money raised to help him get back on his feet once released from hospital.

We want his dad with him as I've got to get working and once he's home he will need some care for the first few weeks. We would like to use some of the raised funds to get his dad to Australia (still much cheaper than a live-in nurse). Please get in touch if anyone is uncomfortable having their donation used for things other than medical bills.


*****************
Hi, we're Dan and Stacey - Quentin's housemate and girlfriend (in that order). We're trying to raise money to help pay for Quentin's medical bills and after-care.

For those who don't know, Quentin was viciously assaulted in an unprovoked attack while he and Dan were walking home from a night out and minding their own business. While Quentin is still in hospital, he is stable and we hope to have him home some time in the near future.

An ongoing criminal investigation is being undertaken and the Victorian police are doing everything in their collective power to catch the perpetrator.

We only have Quentin's recovery in our interests so we will spare no expense or effort to make sure he gets back to 100%

 If any of you can spare any amount - big or small - it will be greatly appreciated.

For those of us that know Q, we know that he has touched our lives, both in a professional and personal way. He is a force of nature we want to have back in ship shape.

What We Need & What You Get

We need quite a bit to get us there but rest assured every penny (cent) pledged will go toward helping Quentin. Even if we don't reach our target, IndieGoGo will pass on around 90% of the raised funds!

We're not sure what perks we can offer but Quentin is the most connected guy out there, definitely a good friend to have. 

To all the talented friends of Q out there: If you can offer a free photoshoot, class or any nice nic-nacs you have spare, we'd love to offer them to encourage people to donate. I'll (Dan) certainly wash the car of anyone who donates a couple of hundred dollars.

Make a real difference

This whole event has brought a lot of people together, evidence of how many people care about Quentin. 

Your donation will ensure Quentin is well cared for and gets back to living life as we all know he does - to the fullest.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, we understand, please get the word out and hopefully someone can help Quentin recover from this atrocity.

If anyone wants to donate but is uncomfortable with using a website, please email save.the.que@gmail.com

story:
At Nutricare, we are market leaders in sustainable healthcare products. We get it - everyone's exercising more, which means more injuries. There's also more knowledge around injury prevention, which means more tape. 

The global market for disposable tapes is growing rapidly and therefore so is an alarming increase in single use tape that has negative effects on the environment. As active people, we had to take matters into our own hands - and that's when we created STRAP. 

 

We make natural innovative health care products because we care. It’s in our name, it’s in our DNA. When founder James Dutton uncovered that his young son Charlie was reacting to common wound dressings he was motivated to find an alternative solution - only there weren’t any. What was uncovered was a staggering number of people that experienced the same problem - 25% of the world’s population.

Fast forward to 2017 after months of research and discovering how many chemicals lurk in common wound care, Nutricare and award winning flagship brand ‘PATCH’ was born - a natural, 100% natural bamboo fibre wound dressing with added goodness of activated charcoal, aloe vera and coconut oil. We are known for our quality, sustainable and ecological credentials. From the materials and packaging, to the 20,000+ trees planted to offset carbon, everything is considered when we create. As we continue to expand and develop, our future is clear. And we’ve only just begun.

story:
On May 22nd Judy Fox was hit by a car, while riding her bike, in Tucson, AZ. She suffered some injuries, including the loss of 3 teeth, a broken maxilla, and a seriously busted up knee. Most of Judy's medical expenses are covered by her insurance (Hoorah!) but not all insurance is created equal, and so Judy is facing paying for oral surgery to get implants as well as (possible*) maxillofacial surgery.

 With the extent of her injuries Judy will not be able to work for a while, which adds considerably to her financial burden. We don't know yet just how much this all will cost, but orthodontic surgery is certainly not cheap, and could range above $15,000 depending on the amount of damage. 

(*We're not sure yet if/what kind of maxillofacial surgery she may need)


Please give what you can- a few dollars or several dollars or maybe a few more. She will need all she can get, and honestly probably a lot more than the $6,000 that i set as our goal. Judy is a beacon of awesome from our community, and although she prefers warmer pastures, she loves and appreciates everyone back home (and elsewhere) for thinking of her and for sending your support. 

Let's put that silly grin back on her face.

story:
Baby Nolan is burlesque performer Kitty Devine's nephew. 

On May 30th, Nolan was rushed to A&E, struggling to breathe. He has a liver condition but doctors do not yet know what kind. 

We are raising funds to send Nolan to the nearest specialist unit for such conditions, which is in Leeds. 

Getting Nolan the help he needs will be costly; the family will have to take time off work, travel from Tyne & Wear to Leeds,  and pay for accommodation on nights they can't stay in the hospital. We also want to be able to access private medical care if necessary.

Your donation will help the family with these costs, while baby Nolan is in hospital.

Long term, we also hope to raise awareness of Nolan's condition and help other babies like him. 

Any donation amount is appreciated.

If you can't donate, then please share this campaign to raise awareness for Nolan.

Read more about Nolan's story here:

http://gallowgateshots.com/other/nolan/

story:
Who is Licia?

Licia is a mum and overall amazing woman (70 year's old) who was diagnosed on June 2014 with Stage II Endometrial Carcinoma - lymph nodes cover her body from the head to the legs.
The diagnosis was a total shock. She first went to the doctor for what she had thought was a simple cystitis only to discover she had an endometrial tumor.

Today Licia is in the fight for her life. But she's not alone...

Who am I?

Her daughter, Elisa.
She gave me life I need to give her an opportunity to win this battle.

Cancer is expensive:

She has to pay £ 15.000 out-of-pocket for her new therapy in Hungary and for medications and everything she needs to follow the guide-lines at home after 2 weeks in the clinic.

Cancer is EXPENSIVE in particular if the protocols followed by your country, aren't enough.

You Can Help!

My goal for this campaign is listed as £ 15.,000, but my real goal is to raise as much as possible - because Licia will need much more to cover daily living expenses that have quickly become a challenge.

Please, Licia is counting on your generosity.

ALL of the funds raised will go towards helping Licia with this life-changing event. It's all love and support, which we also need from you. So thanks!

Other Ways You Can Help:

Please encourage others to give! 

With love,

Elisa

story:
Pelvic Liberation

Cultivating Awareness for a Happy Healthy Pelvis

Self-Inquiry, Pelvic Floor YogaTM and Whole Body Breathing

Using yoga, breathing techniques, self inquiry and a big dash of humor, Leslie brings a thoughtful, thorough and therapeutic focus to a subject that can be difficult and overwhelming.  

This book was written as a call to normalize the conversation about pelvic health and improve women’s knowledge and awareness of their pelvis.  Leslie’s hope is to shine light on a subject shrouded in darkness and misunderstanding and illuminate the beauty and magic of this rich place. She also asks the reader to consider cultural and historical effects on women’s health in general.  

To this end, my book includes detailed explanations of key yoga postures and breathing practices designed to awaken and heal the female pelvis. A system that she calls Pelvic Floor YogaTM  After nearly five years, the book is almost complete. The writing, content development, editing, artwork and cover design, unique illustrations and yoga asana renderings (take a peek at a few of them in the gallery) are finished.  Ahead is design layout, final proofreading and printing. Publication date is just around the corner: November 2017.

Become a backer of this campaign and you will be first in line to get your hands on this book! You can help make this happen, and I need and value your support.

Already, the Pelvic Liberation message has reached thousands of women and professionals. Trainings are in demand around the world, and Pelvic Floor YogaTM online education has been viewed in 20 countries. This book is eagerly awaited by those who are already part of the “Pelvic Liberation”.

Every woman, yoga instructor and women’s health professional will benefit from the compelling blend to heal through recognition of personal history, body posture, healthy breathing, and strengthening, stabilizing, stretching and releasing yoga postures.  

Self-publishing ensures creative control and a collaborative process between author, editors, content director, illustrator, photographer and designer. The complex and elegant design and unique illustrations are considerable and requires attention to detail by a skilled designer who really embraces the vision. You will be pleased with the look and feel of this book; what a joy it is to see it come to life in the way I envisioned.

 Leslie Howard has been a student and teacher of yoga and breathing practices for over twenty years and has logged over 3500 hours of study on the subject.  In 2004 she experienced debilitating pelvic pain and began her investigation into self healing.  Her journey caused reflections on the hows and the whys of her pain and her yoga practice provided many of the answers.  This book outlines her findings of the cultural, medical and societal contributors to women’s pelvic health and offers yoga and breathing techniques to alleviate many of the most common issues.  She was contacted by University of California, San Francisco in 2012 to design a yoga study for incontinence with acclaimed yoga teacher, Judith Lasater that resulted in a 70% decrease in symptoms in six weeks.  In 2013, another study Yoga for Pelvic Pain at UCSF merited a 42% decrease in pelvic pain in six weeks.  She teaches workshops and teacher trainings for therapeutic application of yoga for pelvic floor disorders worldwide.  Her primary yoga teachers have been Ramanand Patel, Manouso Manos and Patricia Walden.  She is a certified yoga therapist with the International Association of Yoga Therapists and a continuing education provider for Yoga Alliance.

Named one of the top 50 yoga instructors in the United States by Sonima Health magazine, 2016.

Quoted in the Huffington Post, The Daily Beast, Shape, Prevention.

Yoga and the Gluteus was the feature article in Yoga Journal 2015, Your Greatest Asset.

Featured in the documentary, Yoga Woman.

You can simply donate to my campaign with the "back it" button and enter any amount you would like to contribute or choose from a wide variety of perks.

I can’t produce this book without your support, so to show my gratitude for your contribution, I am offering a variety of perks, including original artwork by Katarina Kopanska. Check out the many levels of financial support, choose one, click—and the perk will be yours! Some are available in limited quantities (first-come, first-serve), so hurry! (Please check the estimated date of delivery of your perk).

Other ways you can help

Every contribution, whether $10 or $5000, helps us reach our goal in 60 days. So, too, does getting the word out about our project. Word-of-mouth and your excitement helps multiply the value of your support.

Please tell a friend, or 25 friends, or even a 100 friends, acquaintances and co-workers, clients, about Pelvic Liberation.

 Get the word out by phone, email, and talking it up.

 Post a message on your Facebook page.

 Even better, post a link to the campaign video or tweet a link to our IndieGoGo page.

 Share the perk pictures on Instagram

 Visit my website and online education page to see all the other wonderful things I offer.

*Some people are not yet familiar with the power of crowd-funding. Explain how it works and motivate someone to check out my Pelvic Libertion campaign.

Where will funds go?

With the writing, editing, illustrations, and cover design almost complete, some of the money raised will go to pay bills already incurred. The rest is designated for finishing the design and layout, printing, shipping, and marketing expenses which will total more than 15K. Here’s a list of most of the costs broken down:

•  Content Development, Editing, Copy Editing, Proof Reading: $10,000

•  Artwork and Cover design: $5000

•  Artist fees for illustrations. digital scanning and preparation of illustrations: $1500

•  Interior book design, layout, and finishing touches: $3000

•  Photographer and photo editing: $2500

• Marketing (incl. IndieGogo fees): $3000

•  Printing: $10,000

My initial goal of $15,000 will help cover the investment I have already made in bringing this book--my vision--to the public. I am looking forward to launching more goals for an e-book, translated editions, and other exciting related projects.  This is just the beginning—join the wave.

Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Our Mission

Build, deliver, and maintain an effective, high-availability emergency notification service to send a distress signal autonomously in the event of a potentially dangerous or emergency situation. Our goal is to successfully execute this service for a wide variety of audiences, including family members, friends, co-workers, travelers, businessmen and women, community service workers, state employees, federal employees, law enforcement, field agents, military, government, and more.

Backstory

In July (2016), my uncle John and auntie Annie from a nearby state came down for a visit, but it was sort of an unexpected one.

Church had just let out, and as we headed to the car, I received a phone call from my mom: "are you guys on the road yet? Come on over; your aunt and uncle are here. You'll have to hear the story." So off we went.

"I tried calling your parents number, but it said that the number was no longer in use," my aunt started out. "I thought perhaps their number had changed [which it did] so I started calling around to see if anyone else [relatives] had the new one. The only number they had was the same one I tried calling. I even tried sending an email, but got no response, so I began to wonder if something had happened."

After numerous failed attempts at making initial contact, the next reaction was to hop in the car and pay us a visit some four hours away. It was nighttime upon arrival, though, so it was difficult discerning if anyone was at the house, or if my parents were even still living there, "and I didn't want to poke around and risk getting shot," she exclaimed. We had a good laugh about that.

They spent the night at a nearby hotel, searched the phone books, tried calling various churches, and even considered going to the police. As I sat and listened to the whole story, I thought to myself, "this is the person I want on my case when the Pentagon comes looking for me."

The next morning, they checked on the house again, but this time noticed one of the cars was gone. Somewhat relieved, my aunt Annie resolved to leave a note on the gate and call her if we were "still alive and well."

Well, needless to say, everyone was in fact alive and well, but making sure of that was also quite a bit of a hassle and uncertain at best, not to mention the time and money spent personally investigating the matter. Nevertheless, we assured them and expressed our gratitude for being concerned enough to check in on us.

As a security enthusiast and software developer, all this reminded me of warrant canaries and the sentinel species in general. We already use performance monitors for our servers and medical devices on our patients to notify us when something has gone awry. In short, this is precisely what OneGuardian is intended to accomplish, but for the everyday person on an everyday basis. For the uninitiated, it is an easy-to-use personnel monitoring system that can notify your emergency contacts on your behalf (that is, autonomously, without requiring any action on the user's part) in the event of a potentially dangerous or emergency situation.

Or as we like to put it, "Your personal canary in the coal mine of life."

story:
Who We Are

We are Lucien, Keane, and Charlene, three recent college graduates and founders of Standard Hydro. Our purpose - to offer fresh, healthy produce, grown locally in St. Kitts and Nevis, and to bring jobs, training opportunities, and economic empowerment to the community. After studying in these resource scarce, natural disaster prone islands, we developed the idea for our low-cost, efficient, climate resilient shade houses. Right now, Lucien and Keane are getting ready for the permanent move down to St. Kitts to build and  run our hydroponic farms, while Charlene will be working from the U.S. on the research side of the operation.

This campaign is about getting Standard Hydro off the ground. We believe in a new way of doing agriculture and changing the status quo to improve people’s lives. But before we can do any of that we need to raise the initial funds to build another shade house and start selling produce. Our first facility is ready to go and we have a contract with a local grocery store, but we need to build one more shade house before we can provide an adequate supply of food for their local customers. It all started with one, help us get to two, and before you know it we’ll be at 200.

For years, St. Kitts has faced problems with economic diversification, adaptation to climate change and food security. In 2012 the islands imported over 70% of their produce and agriculture contributed only 2% to GDP. The government’s import policy worsens this problem by creating produce shortages and price increases, making it difficult for the average Kittitian to afford a consistent, healthy, balanced diet. Unfortunately, Kittitians are not alone in these issues. That is why we hope to one day provide for countless other communities experiencing similar problems, from Caribbean islands to Sub-Saharan Africa to New York City.

What We Need

  • We need $5,000 to help us finish building our living quarters on the farm and another $5,000 to start construction on our second shade house.

  • No matter how much you give, please email us at standardhydro@gmail.com to sign up for our bi-monthly newsletter and see where your money is going!

  • If we don’t reach our goal, the money you contribute will still go 100 % towards the construction of an additional shade house.

The Impact

Standard Hydro seeks to be a global leader in sustainable food production. We will use our facilities to inspire and implement solutions to the environmental crisis the global community faces. We do not have the resources of a major corporation, private benefactor, or deep family pockets. Instead, we’ve been running on vision and dedication. Your support will help us expand our model and prepare to move to other areas of the world that are in desperate need of healthier, more affordable food.

Working in St. Kitts

Our biggest challenge has been learning to live and do business in a culture where we are foreigners. We have built many friendships and gained a lot of experience from our time spent on the islands, but there will still be a significant adjustment period. The strong bonds that we have formed will help us overcome this challenge; our Kittitian friends are our business partners, members of our advisory board and an invaluable resource on local business practices.

Spread the Word!

If you can’t donate, please help get the word out by sharing our campaign on social media and with your friends in person. Indiegogo has some great social media tools embedded in the page that make it easy to share!

story:
Develop Link Platform

  • Allows medical missions & public hospitals to collaborate

  • Donors can better match donations with the needs of  providers on the ground

  • Helps doctors refer patients to specialists or to providers for follow-up care

  • Driven by data from local communities

  • Pilot has over 100 listings of providers (medical missions & public hospitals)


The Problem

According to The World Health Organization almost $17 billion is spent on global health each year. These efforts produce incredible work but without the ability to connect they encounter many issues:

  • 90% of medical devices in developing countries are donated but only 10-30% of these devices become operational

  • Doctors often turn patients away because they can’t refer them for follow-up care or to the specialists needed

  • Medical aid is often not aligned with the work of local healthcare providers or governmental programs  and detracts from the development of sustainable healthcare infrastructure

History

In Fall 2013, Isabel and Catherine quickly discovered a common interest in the relationship between aid groups and local infrastructure in developing countries. As a healthcare consultant, Catherine was particularly interested in how medical aid groups engaged with local healthcare infrastructure. Having grown up in Chile and worked for the United Nations Mission in Guatemala, Isabel was concerned with how these groups work in Latin America. Combining these interests, the duo began speaking to hundreds of organizations ranging from public hospitals to major NGOs and discovered that all of these parties really see the need for a platform to increase data-driven collaboration.

In June 2014, Isabel and Catherine traveled to Guatemala and after gaining the support of The Guatemalan Ministry of Health and College of Physicians, Catherine took the plunge and left her job to focus on Develop Link full-time. We finished building our MVP in January, formally launched in March, and are now ready to scale and hire a team on the ground. We have already seen first-hand the impact that improving collaboration between healthcare groups can have in Guatemala and hopefully other countries in the future.  


Who We Are

We are a social venture committed to supporting the great efforts of healthcare groups working in developing countries. Our team has diverse experience with backgrounds ranging from backend database development to diplomatic affairs to pharmaceutical sales but we all share a commitment to helping healthcare professionals reach the patients who need them most.

Ask

We need $15,000 to help hire a local team on the ground. We are hiring a developer to continue ensuring that our platform meets the needs of local communities. We are also hiring a sales manager to work with local clinics to help them begin to utilize our platform. This money will not only provide two jobs in Guatemala but will help Develop Link reach as many doctors as possible and help them treat patients.

Combining these interests, the duo began speaking to hundreds of organizations ranging from public hospitals to major NGOs and discovered that all of these parties really see the need for a platform to increase data-driven collaboration.In June 2014, Isabel and Catherine traveled to Guatemala and after gaining the support of The Guatemalan Ministry of Health and College of Physicians, Catherine took the plunge and left her job to focus on Develop Link full-time. We finished building our MVP in January, formally launched in March, and are now ready to scale and hire a team on the ground. We have already seen first-hand the impact that improving collaboration between healthcare groups can have in Guatemala and hopefully other countries in the future.  Who We AreWe are a social venture committed to supporting the great efforts of healthcare groups working in developing countries. Our team has diverse experience with backgrounds ranging from backend database development to diplomatic affairs to pharmaceutical sales but we all share a commitment to helping healthcare professionals reach the patients who need them most.AskWe need $15,000 to help hire a local team on the ground. We are hiring a developer to continue ensuring that our platform meets the needs of local communities. We are also hiring a sales manager to work with local clinics to help them begin to utilize our platform. This money will not only provide two jobs in Guatemala but will help Develop Link reach as many doctors as possible and help them treat patients.

story:
Who We Are

Grameen PrimaCare is a non-profit organization made up of passionate people who care about creating a world where high quality, affordable and comprehensive healthcare is a reality for all.

Hardworking women in low-income communities confront significant challenges in their efforts to integrate into American society. Health is a core contributor to this integration process, driving economic productivity, wellbeing and family development. Yet due to their documentation status, millions of women are excluded from health insurance, severely limiting their access to health resources. At Grameen PrimaCare we believe this is unacceptable and are addressing this need through an alternative model.

Our mission is to provide underserved women from low-income immigrant communities with a high-quality, affordable primary care and health promotion program, empowering them to lead healthier lives. 

Our pilot program, Grameen VidaSana (GVS), was launched in Jackson Heights, Queens, in September 2014. VidaSana, which means “healthy life” in Spanish, is our ultimate goal for our members. Through this program, we provide access to a bilingual, female primary care team, a wellness center, and a combination of discounted health services, including specialty care and prescriptions. In addition, GVS offers group based health promotion workshops that cover such topics as women's health, nutrition, parenting, diabetes, weight control, domestic violence and much more. Through providing a safe space for group discussion and information exchange, we are creating a climate for increased health agency and action. 

Our Impact

By offering access to high quality primary care, health education, and support, we aim to build health literacy, self-efficacy and empower our members to improve their health and wellbeing.We will also inform the broader health and social innovation systems on what is needed to make our health system truly inclusive.

Josefina's Story

One of GVS's first members, Josefina, suffered from an eye problem that left her almost completely blind. Unable to get the treatment she desperately needed in her home country of Mexico, she traveled to the United States and found the surgery she required. Unfortunately her eye problems did not end there, and she soon found her vision in trouble once again. 

When she walked into Grameen VidaSana for the first time, she was looking for a mammogram. What she found instead was a complete and comprehensive primary care program that would ultimately provide her with free eyeglasses, help with managing her diabetes, and a mammogram referral at no additional cost. 

Today, after only two months, Josefina has changed her life drastically for the better. She now takes the stairs at every chance, eats much healthier, visits the program regularly for both doctor visits and to utilize the community space (making her lunch in the practice's kitchen since her current job has no facilities), and is even inspiring her health coaches to make changes in their own habits. Although she was originally reluctant to join the program, as she did not understand the need for regular check-ins since she wasn't sick every day, she is now one of GVS's biggest advocates.

Amazingly, Grameen VidaSana has changed her life in another way as well: on one of her regular visits to the practice, she ran into the brother she had not seen in almost 15 years, since they were separated during their migration process to the United States - his wife was visiting GVS for her own appointment!

Josefina is so grateful to all of the GVS staff and supporters, calling them "angels." By providing this type of care to women who do not have access to it, we are improving the lives of so many.

What We Need

While GVS is able to offer our members a comprehensive enhanced primary care program, as well as referrals to numerous specialty care providers, we do not yet have the capacity to offer coverage for catastrophic care. Medical bills are one of the leading causes of bankruptcy in the US today, affecting around 2 million people both with and without insurance annually. Therefore, we are asking for your help to create a philanthropic fund that will cover the costs of serious emergency care for our members.  Thank you for supporting the women of Grameen VidaSana!

Other Ways You Can Help

Blast this campaign to your local media, friends and family

Make an in-kind donation to help the women of GVS
Follow GPC on Facebook and Twitter and post our Giving Tuesday campaign to your profiles

Thank you so much for your support! Please share this with everyone you can, and remember to make a gift for Giving Tuesday (December 2nd)!

story:
Summary

FitLove is an idea created by my partner Julianne and I to encapsulate the overlapping ideas we want to share with our community about the balance of fitness and love in life.

  • We are seeking to expand our knowledge in CrossFit, one of the premire methods of training exploding throughout the world right now.
  • By contributing to this campaign you can not only help us achieve our goals but we can help you with yours, specifically through perks attained.


What We Need & What You Get

Here is the breakdown folks:

  • The goal is $3848 which will be used for 5 specific certificates and courses: CrossFit Level 1 Certification, CrossFit Specialty Course-Aerobic Capacity, CrossFit Specialty Course-Endurance & 2 CrossFit Level 2 Certifications. 
  • Perks: The money you pledge will not only go towards helping us reach our goal but will also towards helping you reach yours. Every $25 donation equals 30 minutes of personal training. ex: $100 donation = 2 hours of Personal Training towards your personal goal of Eating better, Living better or Training better, etc..
  • If the financial goal is not met 100% of what is raised will still go towards training and certification and all personal training perks will still be honored.  

The Impact

We believe that fitness is an integral part of creating a balanced life.(Mind, Body & Spirit) With this education we expand our knowledge thereby increasing our ability to help people in a broader sense.

  • CrossFit as a brand is recognized the world over. By certifying with them we bring all of their knowledge and experience to the specific communities that we serve.  
  • Helping our friends or clients meet or exceed their goals is always super exciting but the creation of the relationships through that experience is what we value most. It is these relationships that will reinforce the goals that will maintain the lifestyle we help you to achieve while also contributing to the overall health of our families and community. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, we understand, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please get the word out and share about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo tools to share with friends, family or anyone who might be interested in a bit of help achieving their fitness goals. 

And that's all there is to it.

story: My name is mike eades . My wife and i are starting I and I organix farm and urban agricultural business . The reason is to provide low income inner city households an affordable healthier optuon . I got this idea because of the life change my wife and i started , eating organic produce . We noticed the huge price bump for organic produce and the fact that inner city grocery stores dont offer very much selection when it comes to organic produce and the prices were sometimes even higher in the inner city . So i decided to do something about it . My wife amd i have always beem into giving back and helping out in our community so we saw this as a huge opportunity to make a difference.  So im startting a few different social media platforms for my urbam farm to provide transparency not only for any contributors,  but also for my customers and my community.  Theu will showcase all the progress and updates to my entire project . So im teying to raise funds to build 2 greenhouses , purchase two 1,000 gallon warer tanks , a drip works system , soil amendments,  walk in freezer and a few other small  Miscellaneous things im forgetting right this second . Anything raised over will be used to purchase more equipment new lots for expansion plots and many more things to get this up and running . We've also decided to take the leap of faith and work for ourselves so as most people know how risky it is , and we feel its worth the risk . We also live in a time where we have less people growing food in the U.S. then ever in our history as a country . So i feel this is my opportunity to give back and do something i love to do , grow plants that we all need so badly . My inspiration for this is , social responsibility,  environmental responsibility, and a sense of doin my part . Thank you for your time .

story:
BRAIN+ is the World’s first easy and ready-to-use neurofeedback device to improve your Concentration, Relaxation and Memory.

BRAIN+ reads your brain waves, shows you the result and guides you to proper recommendations for improving. Over time, these training sessions will help to improve your cognitive abilities and make your overall brain health better. EEG technology is used in the clinical environment for cognitive rehabilitation, Attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and many other cognitive disorders; it can also be used on a professional athlete, to even train astronauts and is now accessible to you.

 

  • Everyone who wants to become more concentrated relaxed and maintain a better memory. It will also help its users become more productive in everyday life and work.
  • Healthy seniors, to prevent brain dementia.
  • Improve cognitive for dementia seniors.
  • Children with ADHD to reduce its root cause.
  • Healthy children who would like to improve their brain functions. 

 

Frankly, it works like a blood pressure machine. However, in contrast, it measures your brain waves’ power, not your blood pressure level.

You can use our application to train your brain, play a game and many other provided tasks, only using your thoughts. For example, you can focus a candle on a screen to improve the visibility; the more you focus it, the more it lights up. 

 

 

Our application guides you to improve your brain waves’ power in concentration, relaxation and memory. We interpret it into easy readable figures and various types of graphs. The application will record your result. The next day or the next time you return to training, you can force your brain to get a higher score.

Continuous training as such will make your brain function better and improve its concentration, relaxation and memory.

 

Concentration:

Guide your focus several tasks on the screen to increase your concentration power, which will improve your brain functions over time. The research claims that the benefits are: Ability to think quickly, Feeling excited, Goal-oriented, Peak-performance, Highest levels of focus, Positive thoughts, Increased IQ and writing speed.​

 

Relaxation:

This eases your mind using several methods and will reflect your relaxation score. Training like this from time to time will improve your peace of  mind. The research claims that the benefits are: Deep Relaxation of the Body and Mind, Higher Levels of Creativity, Improved Problem-Solving Abilities, Improved Mood and Stability of Emotions.​

 

Memory:

Your memory will be trained using several methods such as the picture matching game, whereas we will show your memory score concurrently. Training like this from time to time will make your brain function better and enhance your memory. The research claims that the benefits are: New found binding mechanism among all parts of the brain and improving perception and memory.

 

This training in brain waves’ power will propel your brain to be in a more healthy state. Reduce the risk of Alzheimer’s and any other brain disease.

Old fashion methods used in hospitals to improve brain function like playing a card game or reading the 3D image, will be done on the paper and measure your result with big and messy EEG machine later. With BRAIN+, you will know the result of your brain improvement immediately by the BRAIN+ tablet screen. Thanks to this neurofeedback technology, you can force your brain to improve in real-time using BRAIN+.

Also, you can train your brain with any other normal life method like meditation and so on. However, by the end of the day, you will be able to measure your brain’s power improvement with BRAIN+. Make your brain training more fun and meaningful by tracking it.

Last but not least, you will get Windows10 tablet for work, leisure or for use when away from the training session!

 

Our goal is to guide you to have a better brain and a better life.

BRAIN+ does not need 3rd party devices like a mobile phone or PC. We bundle it with our Windows10 customized port tablet for brain wave reading. You can monitor your brain activity and train your brain concurrently. Our state of the art technology will guide you to achieving a better brain and a better life.

And Yes! You get the Windows10 tablet for work, leisure or for use when away from the training session!

We are experts in what we do. We know how sensitive the EEG signal is. Sensors have to stick firmly on the scalp to read brain waves. We noticed some other products elsewhere, strangely placing sensors on thick  hair or on the back of the ears. Hair interrupts the EEG signal so instead, we place sensors in the best position as in our research paper. We even know how the body movement interferes with the EEG signal so our application will guide you for the best outcome.

As the brain signal researchers, we proudly make real EEG device, the perfect BRAIN+ for you.

 

BRAIN+ is more than just the EEG headband to read your brain waves. Our state-of-the-art EEG headband and smart algorithm system can improve your concentration, relaxation and memory.

After much research, we found the correlation between several states of mind (Concentration, Relaxation, Memory, etc.) and brain waves. We also conducted a research on how to improve those states of mind.

From this knowhow, we can extract your brain waves, monitor their power and guide you to have improved brain power with our special algorithm.

 

For the best calibration, we took a trip to little Tibet - Leh Ladahk, the land of lama, iconic of the meditation master.

We collect the data and do the comprehensive research to ensure that our device works just great for you.

 

There are many main points out there regarding brain problems in this World. Let BRAIN+ be one factor that helps reduce these problems. Continuously using our application will bring you the better brain. Also, we could raise awareness for people to be more caring about their brain.

 

 

Build from the scratch.

Put our heart in every detail.

Authentically designed for your best experience

 

  • Our state-of-the-art patent pending system extracts brain waves into a readable format.
  • Our smart algorithm makes a perfect correlation between brain waves and state of mind.
  • Our cutting edge circuit is carefully built to deliver the best signal with low noises.
  • Our EEG sensor from the US sensor maker company funded by NASA and US Navy, make our product even better. We have a special dry electrode -> Say goodbye to the wet gel on your scalp.

 

Attention training using minimal EEG channels
K. Yaomanee, S. Pan-ngum, P. I. N. Ayuthaya. “Brain signal detection methodology for attention training using minimal EEG channels.” IEEE, 2012 Tenth International Conference on ICT and Knowledge Engineering, November 2012, Pages 84-89

EEG relation with creativity
Caroline Lustenberger, Michael R. Boyle, A. Alban Foulser, Juliann M. Mellin, Flavio Fröhlichur. “ Functional role of frontal alpha oscillations in creativity.” ELSEVIER Cortex Volume 67, June 2015, Pages 74–82

Enhancement of Attention and Cognitive Skills using EEG
Kavitha P Thomas, A. P. Vinod Senior Member IEEE and Cuntai Guan Senior Member IEEE. “Enhancement of Attention and Cognitive Skills using EEG based Neurofeedback Game.” 6th Annual International IEEE EMBS Conference on Neural Engineering San Diego, California, 6 - 8 November, 2013, Pages 21-24

Working memory training: Improving intelligence-Changing brain activity
Norbet J. and Ksenjia J., “Working memory training: Improving intelligence-Changing brain activity.”, Brain and Cognition, vol. 79, pp. 96-106, February 2012.

Neurofeedback training improves cognitive performance
Zoefel B., Huster R. J., and Herrmann C. S., “Neurofeedback training of the upper alpha frequency band in EEG improves cognitive performance,” NeuroImage, vol. 54, pp. 1427–1431, 2011.

Increase brain wave power by Neurofeedback improves cognitive performance in human subjects
Hanslmayer S., Sauseng P., Doppelmayer M., Schabus M., and Klimesch W., “Increasing individual upper alpha by neurofeedback improves cognitive performance in human subjects,” Applied Psychophysiology and Biofeedback, vol. 30, pp. 1-10, 2005.

Effect of training distinct neurofeedback protocols on aspects of cognitive performance
Vernon D., Egner T., Cooper N., Compton T., Neilands C., Sheri A. and Gruzelier J., “The effect of training distinct neurofeedback protocols on aspects of cognitive performance,” International Journal of Psychophysiology, vol. 47, pp. 75-85, 2003.

3D Game for Attention Training and Rehabilitation
Lijun Jiang, Cuntai Guan, Haihong Zhang, Chuanchu Wang and Bo Jiang, “Brain Computer Interface based 3D Game for Attention Training and Rehabilitation,” 6th IEEE Conference on Industrial Electronics and Applications, Singapore, pp. 124-127, June 2011.

EEG based neurofeedback game for enhancing attention and memory
Kavitha P. Thomas, A. P. Vinod and Cuntai Guan, “Design of an online EEG based neurofeedback game for enhancing attention and memory,” 35th Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society (EMBC'13), Osaka, Japan, July 2013.

 

Convenient with High Quality Data

The inconvenience of using gold cup electrodes and conductive paste eliminated by BRAIN+; BRAIN+ collects high quality EEG with dry sensors. There is no setup time, and it is super convenient for EEG data collecting.

SDK Support 

You will get full access to our developer SDK. You can get raw data from F7-FpZ-F8, calculated concentration/relaxation/memory metrics and furthermore computed features. Run your own experiments or build the BCI application of your dreams, all through a comfortable, great-EEG headband.

 

We put all our heart and effort into this project. As the years go by, with our unstoppable determination; we build everything from scratch with our own technology. Now our dream has nearly come true, our dream to have the life-changing device for humanity, our dream to make people get a better brain and a better life.

Please share this project globally. We hope it will also raise awareness about the brain disorder so we can improve it. We could potentially reduce tons of brain disorder patients on planet Earth. With your support, we will be able to scale up manufacturing and bring our project to the World.

BRAIN+ is now ready for production, and we are so excited to share what we have built with the Indiegogo community.

 

 

     

 



We are the researchers and hearted innovators-turned entrepreneurs. Our aim is to help humanity live healthy and happily. Not just earn big profits. 

Our founder started the brain wave research in 2011 as the researcher named in IEEE brain signal publication in 2012 (Brain Signal Detection Methodology for Attention Training using minimal EEG channels) and Master Degree thesis research in brain signal. We know a lot and are experts in what we do.

With a rock solid background in BCI, electrical projects, computer applications, artificial intelligence, system design and with a tech passion, we have done many technology-related projects from small to national impact. We have full confidence that our expertise is the perfect to commence this exciting innovation. With your support, we can finish this excitement and change the World together.

The startup product by a real researcher. For your better brain!

 

 

 

Headband

  • 3 dry electrode sensors
  • Fit well with all shape of head
  • High quality texture with super comfort.


Tablet

  • Intel Atom, Quad-cores, (1.5-2.4GHz) 
  • Display: 10.1'' IPS 1280*800
  • Windows10 included
  • RAM 4GB
  • ROM 64GB 
  • Front/Rear camera

 

(1) Why wired, and not wireless?

  • EEG signal is very sensitive. We want to have the best signal quality, without interruption from Bluetooth or Wi-Fi at the source of the signal transmission.
  • With our wired solution, there'll be no battery required in the headbands. Reasons: better safety and less signal interruption.

  • EEG signal is also sensitive to body movement or even eye-blinking. For the best practical use, we propose using it as a stationary device.

(2) Why BRAIN+ tablet?

  • BRAIN+ tablet has a customized USB port that will be fully compatible with the USB dongle from the headband; hence, a better signal quality.

 

We are confident that our product will be delivered on time. Everything has been meticulously planned, from manufacturing to logistics for a smooth operation. We also have 78 pieces of the early version (32GB) of the final product in stock.

The core software is now fully complete and tested. We are in the phase of developing more training sessions and improving GUI. However, we will update our application regularly via our online channel. You can update it anywhere, anytime wirelessly after receiving the product.

The real challenge for us is to build the platform for user brain health. We built the website and application BRAINPLUS.CO to be a one-stop platform for the user. The user can print their training record and an in-depth analysis of brain health. We will make BRAINPLUS.CO  your brain health portal.

Thanks to this neurofeedback technology, you can force your brain to improve in real-time using BRAIN+.Also, you can train your brain with any other normal life method like meditation and so on. However, by the end of the day, you will be able to measure your brain’s power improvement with BRAIN+. Make your brain training more fun and meaningful by tracking it.Last but not least, you will get Windows10 tablet for work, leisure or for use when away from the training session! Our goal is to guide you to have a better brain and a better life.BRAIN+ does not need 3rd party devices like a mobile phone or PC. We bundle it with our Windows10 customized port tablet for brain wave reading. You can monitor your brain activity and train your brain concurrently. Our state of the art technology will guide you to achieving a better brain and a better life.
And Yes! You get the Windows10 tablet for work, leisure or for use when away from the training session!
We are experts in what we do. We know how sensitive the EEG signal is. Sensors have to stick firmly on the scalp to read brain waves. We noticed some other products elsewhere, strangely placing sensors on thick  hair or on the back of the ears. Hair interrupts the EEG signal so instead, we place sensors in the best position as in our research paper. We even know how the body movement interferes with the EEG signal so our application will guide you for the best outcome.As the brain signal researchers, we proudly make real EEG device, the perfect BRAIN+ for you. BRAIN+ is more than just the EEG headband to read your brain waves. Our state-of-the-art EEG headband and smart algorithm system can improve your concentration, relaxation and memory.After much research, we found the correlation between several states of mind (Concentration, Relaxation, Memory, etc.) and brain waves. We also conducted a research on how to improve those states of mind.From this knowhow, we can extract your brain waves, monitor their power and guide you to have improved brain power with our special algorithm. For the best calibration, we took a trip to little Tibet - Leh Ladahk, the land of lama, iconic of the meditation master.We collect the data and do the comprehensive research to ensure that our device works just great for you. There are many main points out there regarding brain problems in this World. Let BRAIN+ be one factor that helps reduce these problems. Continuously using our application will bring you the better brain. Also, we could raise awareness for people to be more caring about their brain.  Build from the scratch.Put our heart in every detail.Authentically designed for your best experience 
Our state-of-the-art patent pending system extracts brain waves into a readable format.
Our smart algorithm makes a perfect correlation between brain waves and state of mind.

Our cutting edge circuit is carefully built to deliver the best signal with low noises.

Our EEG sensor from the US sensor maker company funded by NASA and US Navy, make our product even better. We have a special dry electrode -> Say goodbye to the wet gel on your scalp.
 Attention training using minimal EEG channelsK. Yaomanee, S. Pan-ngum, P. I. N. Ayuthaya. “Brain signal detection methodology for attention training using minimal EEG channels.” IEEE, 2012 Tenth International Conference on ICT and Knowledge Engineering, November 2012, Pages 84-89EEG relation with creativityCaroline Lustenberger, Michael R. Boyle, A. Alban Foulser, Juliann M. Mellin, Flavio Fröhlichur. “ Functional role of frontal alpha oscillations in creativity.” ELSEVIER Cortex Volume 67, June 2015, Pages 74–82Enhancement of Attention and Cognitive Skills using EEGKavitha P Thomas, A. P. J., and Herrmann C. S., “Neurofeedback training of the upper alpha frequency band in EEG improves cognitive performance,” NeuroImage, vol. 54, pp. 1427–1431, 2011.Increase brain wave power by Neurofeedback improves cognitive performance in human subjectsHanslmayer S., Sauseng P., Doppelmayer M., Schabus M., and Klimesch W., “Increasing individual upper alpha by neurofeedback improves cognitive performance in human subjects,” Applied Psychophysiology and Biofeedback, vol. 30, pp. 1-10, 2005.Effect of training distinct neurofeedback protocols on aspects of cognitive performanceVernon D., Egner T., Cooper N., Compton T., Neilands C., Sheri A. and Gruzelier J., “The effect of training distinct neurofeedback protocols on aspects of cognitive performance,” International Journal of Psychophysiology, vol. 47, pp. 75-85, 2003.3D Game for Attention Training and RehabilitationLijun Jiang, Cuntai Guan, Haihong Zhang, Chuanchu Wang and Bo Jiang, “Brain Computer Interface based 3D Game for Attention Training and Rehabilitation,” 6th IEEE Conference on Industrial Electronics and Applications, Singapore, pp. 124-127, June 2011.EEG based neurofeedback game for enhancing attention and memoryKavitha P. Thomas, A. P. Vinod and Cuntai Guan, “Design of an online EEG based neurofeedback game for enhancing attention and memory,” 35th Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society (EMBC'13), Osaka, Japan, July 2013. Convenient with High Quality DataThe inconvenience of using gold cup electrodes and conductive paste eliminated by BRAIN+; BRAIN+ collects high quality EEG with dry sensors. There is no setup time, and it is super convenient for EEG data collecting.SDK Support You will get full access to our developer SDK. You can get raw data from F7-FpZ-F8, calculated concentration/relaxation/memory metrics and furthermore computed features. Run your own experiments or build the BCI application of your dreams, all through a comfortable, great-EEG headband. We put all our heart and effort into this project. As the years go by, with our unstoppable determination; we build everything from scratch with our own technology. Now our dream has nearly come true, our dream to have the life-changing device for humanity, our dream to make people get a better brain and a better life.Please share this project globally. We hope it will also raise awareness about the brain disorder so we can improve it. We could potentially reduce tons of brain disorder patients on planet Earth. With your support, we will be able to scale up manufacturing and bring our project to the World.BRAIN+ is now ready for production, and we are so excited to share what we have built with the Indiegogo community.        We are the researchers and hearted innovators-turned entrepreneurs. Our aim is to help humanity live healthy and happily. Not just earn big profits. Our founder started the brain wave research in 2011 as the researcher named in IEEE brain signal publication in 2012 (Brain Signal Detection Methodology for Attention Training using minimal EEG channels) and Master Degree thesis research in brain signal. We know a lot and are experts in what we do.With a rock solid background in BCI, electrical projects, computer applications, artificial intelligence, system design and with a tech passion, we have done many technology-related projects from small to national impact. We have full confidence that our expertise is the perfect to commence this exciting innovation. With your support, we can finish this excitement and change the World together.The startup product by a real researcher. For your better brain!   Headband
3 dry electrode sensors
Fit well with all shape of head
High quality texture with super comfort.
Tablet
Intel Atom, Quad-cores, (1.5-2.4GHz) 
Display: 10.1'' IPS 1280*800
Windows10 included
RAM 4GB
ROM 64GB 
Front/Rear camera
 (1) Why wired, and not wireless?
EEG signal is very sensitive. We want to have the best signal quality, without interruption from Bluetooth or Wi-Fi at the source of the signal transmission.
With our wired solution, there'll be no battery required in the headbands. Reasons: better safety and less signal interruption.
EEG signal is also sensitive to body movement or even eye-blinking. For the best practical use, we propose using it as a stationary device.
(2) Why BRAIN+ tablet?BRAIN+ tablet has a customized USB port that will be fully compatible with the USB dongle from the headband; hence, a better signal quality. We are confident that our product will be delivered on time. Everything has been meticulously planned, from manufacturing to logistics for a smooth operation. We also have 78 pieces of the early version (32GB) of the final product in stock.The core software is now fully complete and tested. We are in the phase of developing more training sessions and improving GUI. However, we will update our application regularly via our online channel. You can update it anywhere, anytime wirelessly after receiving the product.The real challenge for us is to build the platform for user brain health. We built the website and application BRAINPLUS.CO to be a one-stop platform for the user. The user can print their training record and an in-depth analysis of brain health. We will make BRAINPLUS.CO  your brain health portal.

story:
Why?

First, we would like to thank you for coming this far. Your interest in Parkour as a discipline and community is enough support for us. 

  • By "We" I mean the PPK Team. We started as just 4 dedicated visionaries and have grown to over 20 trusted die hard Certified Instructors, Administrators, & Interns (many of whom you've seen in the video above).
  • We are GROWING to meet the demand of our amazing supporters; expanding into the Princeton area with our 3rd location.
  • Exactly 5 years ago we taught our first Parkour class in South Jersey as the first facility on the entire EAST COAST dedicated to Parkour. Since then we've expanded into two massive playgrounds of awesomeness (Washington Township and Cherry Hill)...and now we're heading north. 

Keep reading for details on what's in it for you! 

What's in it for me? 

Contribution details: 

  • FIRST, without a doubt, the best thing about contributing now is the incredible membership discounts you'll be receiving by signing up during the pre-sale (these prices WILL NOT be available after the closing of this campaign). 
  • We are on a mission to raise $20,000 for the NEW facility. The more money we raise the more awesome stuff we're going to put in the gym! 
  • Not only will you be receiving direct perks (listed below) but you will be helping us create a bigger, safer, and more creative environment for you and your little ones to learn, play, and grow as healthy people.
  • Specifically: we will be getting a GIANT FOAM PIT, BAR SETUP, WARPED WALLS, AND OTHER FUN NINJA OBSTACLES. 

I have no money but I want to help! 

No money? No problem! Here's what you CAN DO:

  • You can share this link to others that you think might benefit from contributing during the pre-sale. 
  • You can help us transport, and organize stuff as well as build and paint new stuff at the new place. 
  • And you can be helpful by telling others that Pinnacle Parkour is about inspiring people through movement. We want to change lives, help families get healthy, and get kids into a positive and uplifting lifestyle. 

Thank you again, we could not have done it without you.

story:
Short Summary

My name is John Guchua I am 28 years old, I was born and brought up in one of the informal settlement (slums) of Nairobi Mukuru Viwandani or ‘Lunga Lunga’. I went to school at Saint Elizabeth primary school. Due to my parents financial constraints they were not able to take me to high school. This made me stay at home and help them in their daily chores. Luckily, after 3 months, I was introduced by a friend to a free Art School (Mukuru Arts and Craft). Here I was empowered through learning art skills, both practical and theoretical. Luckily I was able to make sales from the arts I produced. Through this journey of art I was able to pay and join high school. It was both successful and a challenge too, as being an artist it needs a lot of patience, commitment and love of art, when coming to art sales you might stay for months without making any sale. Due to these challenges I lost a lot of friends in judicial and mob killings as some of them had become involved in crime and wanted to make ends meet for their family, some were impatient and dropped out from the artistic world, while others involved themselves in drug abuse. Only a few made it to be artists and to use it as a career.

I started volunteering while I was in high school giving back to my community by teaching and sharing art not only practically but also as a tool for expression and therapy. I was signed into a dance school (Sarakasi and Safari park troupe dance) where I learned the mediums of all genres of Dance and Theatre, implementing them to my community.

 I was invited to join a yoga session at one of yoga centers in Nairobi, Africa yoga project   where they offer free community yoga class. I was inspired by its flow, the therapeutic healing and transformation it had in mind body and soul, towards me, as I thought yoga was only physical. I promised myself to learn it and share its vibes to my community and to the people who are not able to pay yoga classes. I did my yoga teacher training, and got certified as a Baptiste and Kundalini Yoga teacher, and also as an art therapist and choreographer. I have been teaching community outreaches, private and group classes, corporate and NGOs, spreading the love of yoga and art therapy awareness. I am the founder of YOGARTEC company (yoga and art technology) and co-founder of creative yoga millennium.i also work with africa yoga project and yoga teachers for africa(kundalini yoga under Yogi Bhajan teachings).

The Impact

The aim and goals for this project is to use yoga and art as a tool for transformation empowerment, healing and awakening, reaching to all aspects society, people from different backgrounds e.g. children, youths, adults and marginalized, people living with HIV/AIDs, physically and mentally challenged, and for those living in trauma and stigma.

What We Need & What You Get

All these classes to be done in a creative and fun way, I have had a lot of success and challenges at the same time in yoga and art classes. The purpose of this fundraising is to raise 1200 Dollars to purchase a 3-D video mapping projector and 3d software. The project will overcome challenges and bring impact in yoga and art classes, below are some of the challenges that will be covered show how the projector and the software will be used.

WORKSHOPS AND TRAINING (YOGA AND ART)

-Students will learn and get empowered in anatomical structure, to understand how muscles, bones and body function before joining yoga practice on the mat through projection.

-They will learn body alignment through videos and visual aids on the projection in 3d format and  help in avoiding, managing and preventing more injuries in a yoga class.

DOCUMENTARIES

-Different documentaries based on educative theme will be shown to empower the students and the community to create awareness and to make informed decision e.g. yoga, arts, ecology, and other relevant topics.

SHOWCASING 3D YOGA ANIMATION.

-This  will be done in creating awareness on yoga and arts in schools, community halls and organizations.it will be based in creating awareness to the subjects and making them learn about yoga, and its benefit  as well as an entertainment and fun, sharing at the end of the session what is learned and suggestions/ideas.

YOGA VIDEO PRACTICE THROUGH PROJECTION

-Students will practice through lessons based on video projection from different masters and teachers e.g. YOGI BHAJAN live teachings and empowerment.

DANCE CHOREOGRAPHY

-The projector and the software will be used in creating video dance projection for performance and to create pieces based on different topics, the type of dances and arts to be used on will be e.g. African Contemporary Dance, Poetry, Storytelling and others.

INCOME GENERATING ACTIVITY

-The projector will be rented at an affordable price to the community members, groups  organizations for community purpose,10% of its income will go towards sustaining yoga and arts activities in the community outreaches e.g. Having a clean and safe place to practice on, buying yoga props –mats, yoga blocks, water and tea to be offered,

Your help is much appreciated.

If you are not able to give financial support, please share!

story:
Water sports are a great way to exercise, but in life, it’s all about choices. SCUBAJET accepts the challenge and brings some of the most popular aquatic activities to the next level. The water sports gear allows to make decisions based on individual needs or habits by combining motor power and paddling.  Comparable to an e-bike, it turns your aquatic equipment into fast, comfortable and reliable devices.

Stand up paddling (SUP) is one of the fastest-growing water sports nowadays. Within a few seconds and requiring no tools SCUBAJET turns every stock board into a powerful e-SUP-board. On top of that, SCUBAJET can be used for other water sports, like canoeing, dinghies and even for snorkeling and diving.

While conventional diving scooters are often big and bulky and weight between 10 and 25 kg (22 to 55 lbs.), the SCUBAJET has a streamlined appearance with only 3 kg (6.6 lbs.) including the Dive Adapter. Additionally underwater scooters are most often unwieldy, whereas the SCUBAJET allows to decide even during the dive whether to be used or not. If the SCUBAJET is not needed at the moment, it can simply be fixed to the buoyancy compensator – without any compromises. This simple solution is unique, there's nothing like it on the market. 

The SCUBAJET is constructed for max. pressure of 6 bar/87psi. We use a special shaft seal that can handle this amount of pressure. The theoretical depth limit based on the pressure is max. 50m/196ft. We give a warranty up to 45m/147ft.

One of the big advantages is the innovative adapter system that provides various possibilities to use SCUBAJET on any imaginable water sports equipment. No technical skills are needed at any point. The plug&play system and the water resistant remote control make it easy to start, stop and select different speeds while using it on the water.

adapter systems and SCUBAJET

 

Take your existing board or equipment and extend it with SCUBAJET easily. Select the appropiate adpater and you are ready to go in a few seconds. We provide adapters for SUP, kanu, dinghi boats and dive. Many of the adapters use standardized finplugs for maximum convenience. By now we support and provide adapters for more than 20 different manufactures and many of them use standardized finplugs. So it's easy for us to provide compatible adapters. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

One of these Finbox Adapter is included with every SCUBAJET: 

- Future Fin System
- O'Fish'l Fin System
- LokBox Fin System
- ProBox Fin System
- US Finbox System
- Sevylor Fin System
- FCS II Fin System

 

Special Adapter (available as pledges) 

- Dive Adapter (speed and motor activation can be controlled directly on the adapter)
- Dinghi Adapter (will be delivered with a trim function and pivot up/down)
- Kayacat Adapter (can be pivot up/down – for sailing for example)
- Universal Adapter Boats/Kayak/Kanu (Tilt/Trim, steering with original rudder or with the Scubajet Adapter, self-supporting swivel arm, adapater will be fixed with 4 screws)

Until now we support the following manufactures. We continuously extend the list. If you can't find the right adapter, please inform us about the desired manufacturer and we'll get in touch to put it on our adapter request list.

manufacturers

 

Upcoming Adapter in the next months:

- Hobie Adapter that fits into the MirageDrive box
- ONAK Adapter
- Universal Adapter for SUP
- Universal Adapter for KANU/KAYAKS- DIY Adapter Templates

 

Our electric motor allows you to go further to find your perfect spot to enjoy. You are able to stay on the water longer and tackle bigger trips with your water buddies. SCUBAJET brings you back to the shore safely and is made for active people and sports enthusiasts as well as families.

 

the handy dive adapter

SCUBAJET on SUP-board

 

with kids in a dinghi on the water

perfect for snorkeling

SCUBAJET offers various engine mappings for scuba diving (slow speed and long battery lifetime), power mode (short high speed sprints), SUP (paddling support or surfing without paddle) or freehand. 

Measuring only 58 cm (~22 inch) length and a diameter of 7,2cm (~2,8 inch) and weighing just 3kg (~6,6 lbs), SCUBAJET is easy to transport and fits in every backpack.

You can control the SCUBAJET easily with the included remote control. Three buttons control all the functions, for increasing/decreasing speed, as well as to spot the engine. The auto-shut off system stops the engine immediately if you fall into the water and it will also be used for initial power on SCUBAJET over magnetic switch. SCUBAJET is also safe for kids as well since we use jet-power instead of regular propeller motors.

 

 

Due to the latest safety and security regulations for batteries, there is a limit of two spare batteries per person for the larger lithium ion batteries (up to 160 wh per battery). But as we know traveling is particulary important of many water sports fans, it was very important to us to meet your expectations and so we now provide a travel battery pack that consists of 2x160 wh batteries, that is allowed on airplanes!

 

We have tested and implemented a bunch of great features like the SmartPower Technology. It offers long battery time up to 240 minutes with the internal battery and up to 720 minutes with the external battery pack. The external battery pack will be available with beginning of 2017.

 

 

 

Every SCUBAJET has a high tech LED light in the front with 500 Lumen.

It's not only super practical while staying on the water during your canoe-, dinghi- or SUP trip for underwater lighting, its also possible to use the lamp without the engine unit. The lamp alone is also proofed for a depth of 45m.

And that's not all! If you need more Lumen for diving as example you will be able to upgrade the lamp to 1.500 Lumen or add it as accessory.

 

 
 
 

 


During the entire development process, SCUBAJET was used by a lot of different people to get their opinion and as much feedback as possible.

 

We've started to create a jet-engine for different applications two years ago and we already started the serial production, so it's a great opportunity for you to get the best price ever for the SCUBAJET.  

Scope of delivery: SCUBAJET, charger, remote control, finbox adapter

After we receive your order you can choose between different adapters for SUP (FCS II Fin System, Future Fin System, O'Fish'l Fin System, LokBox Fin System, ProBox Fin Systems, US Finbox System) or kanu (Sevylor, universal adapter).

 


Patrizia has always been a sporting ace and a real water lover. She grew up in Italy near Lake Constance and pursued her water hobbies ever since. Three years ago, her daughter was born and she was confronted with reconciling family life and her beloved hobby. She didn't want to give up water sports but she felt insecure about taking her daughter on the SUP board. "What if there is a thunderstorm coming up?", was one of the thoughts fostering her tentativeness. In addition, she wanted to take the whole family to the water without buying a motorboat to enjoy the beautiful summer in Carinthia.

Out of these thoughts the idea of creating a flexible motor for water sports emerged. Consequently, her boyfriend Armin and his father Gert developed the SCUBAJET. Nowadays, Patrizia enjoys standing on her SUP board together with her daughter to escape the crowds at Lake Wörth's beaches.

Patrizia has a strong background in marketing in the sea freight industry. With SCUBAJET she turns her hobby into profession.

Please help us to make our dreams come true, share our amazing project and follow us on Facebook and Twitter for further news.
