story:
Imagine How You Can Change the Future of Medicine! 

Wouldn't it be great if you could look up your medical records as easily and securely as you would look up your checking account balance online?  Wouldn't it be useful, for example, to be able to print your child's immunization records on demand, even if the information came from different providers or different facilities?  Wouldn't it be incredible to receive real-time notifications when new test or lab results are posted to your medical record? 

And wouldn't it be mind-blowing to be able to access every medical document, produced by every provider, at every medical facility you've ever visited and be able to retain control over that information forever?

This project is the culmination of years of effort in bringing together the right people, developing the technological infrastructure and strategic partnerships, as well as defining the medical and legal framework to make this happen.

It is our hope that you will see the importance of this project and the significance of the role you can play in transforming the medical landscape of tomorrow.

As you read and learn about the "My Medical Records" Project, you will learn about the various elements necessary to bring together your records in one place. You will also learn how a Health Security Number is a prerequisite to bringing these records together. Your contributions will go directly to funding an open-sourced software portal which we will build using the proprietary technology we've already developed. By implementing this software solution, we will open the door to a whole new way of looking at medical records.

The Reality of Patient-Centered Care

The biggest obstacle with healthcare record integration is the absence of a "Unique Patient Identifier" (also known as a UPI). Without it, it is almost impossible to bring all of our records together from different providers and different facilities. A Unique Patient Identifier can be a medical record number, for example. It identifies you to your health care provider. Part of the problem, is that everybody uses a different Unique Patient Identifier to identify you.

Privacy advocates balk at the idea of having the government or any single group maintain a database of Unique Patient Identifiers. Our approach is uniquely different. We use a method of producing UPIs which does not involve databases. Only you and your providers know your UPI. Also, the data stored under the UPI is protected, so even if your UPI is lost or stolen, your health records are still protected.

Introducing Your Health Security Number

Our portal will provide you with your Health Security Number is without relying on on serialized numbers (i.e., numbers in a sequence), randomized numbers (which cannot be reproduced if lost or stolen) or numbers stored in a centralized database. When your Health Security Number is produced, it will only be known to you and your providers who know you.  Your Health Security Number will uniquely identify you to all of your providers including your doctors, dentists, pharmacists and other health care professionals.

Fig. 1.  The anatomy of our Health Security Card.

Fig. 2.  The front-side of our patient brochure.

Fig. 3.  The back-side of our patient brochure.

A True Grass-Roots Movement

We have worked closely with regional, state and national leadership to develop a wide grass-roots effort to make patient-centered records a reality.  Over the past decade, we've listened to patients, doctors, and hospitals about their needs and their desire for improved access to records.  We've developed strategic partnerships with a number of companies and entrepreneurs.  We've received a number of accolades and endorsements from politicians and decision-makers.

Fig. 4. Excerpt from a letter from Senator Mikulski supporting our efforts in medical record integration.

Fig. 5. Excerpt from a letter from Congressman Van Hollen endorsing Medical Informatics' efforts in creating cloud-based medical records.

But aren't all doctors going electronic anyway?

The short answer is "some are, and some are not." Despite attempts by lawmakers to promote wide adoption of electronic records, only some doctors and hospitals have already transitioned to electronic health records system, while others are in the process of transitioning, and some have vowed to fight such a transition.And just because a facility is electronic, it does not mean that you will have personal access to your records or access to records maintained at other sites.In a survey of 2,758 physicians published in the New England Journal of Medicine, only four percent of respondents had a robust, fully integrated electronic records system (NEJM: 359:50-60, July 2008). Today’s health care is being delivered by some providers who embrace branded electronic records that are poorly integrated as well as those who continue to resist the electronification of records altogether. It is the lack of coordination between these groups that remains one of the biggest barriers to unification of records. 

Don't I have access to my records anyway?

Absolutely, yes.  The Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) guarantees patients access to their records.  A number of obstacles remain, however.  For example, providers often will charge "administrative fees" each and every time records are produced.  The records are usually limited to one facility or provider, and not truly integrated.  Furthermore, the data is seldom presented electronically, in a manner accessible by today's smartphones and tablets.

Our proposal goes well beyond simple access to records. It provides you with the following:

  • Secure access to our open-sourced software portal (developed with your generous contribution) to generate your own unique personal Health Security Number;
  • A physical card imprinted with your unique Health Security Number;
  • Your secure cloud-space, reserved for your personal health records;
  • Migration of all legacy records (paper & electronic) from any number of sources to your cloud-space;
  • Access to our "fax-to-cloud" functionality and other bridging solutions to keep your records perpetually up-to-date;
  • Access to software enabling private, secure access to your records using your Mac, PC, smartphone, or tablet, and;
  • Electronic notification to you when someone views or changes anything in your cloud-space.

Why is this a "good" thing?

Our Health Security Number and approach to medical records is beneficial in so many ways. Let's discuss just few of them.

Reduction of Medical Errors

Having easier access to you own records gives you a better chance of catching medical errors in your chart. Although existing laws insure that patients have the right to ask for their records, very few patients actually exercise the right because of the paperwork and fees associated with a records release. Our vision, is that eventually you'll be able to see your provider, receive a text notification that your records have been updated, and be able to review the note for that encounter as soon as its generated. This unprecedented level of transparency will reduce errors associated with erroneous charting, by empowering patients through easier and seamless access to their own records.

Elimination of Redundant Testing

Patients are often time seen by providers at different sites for the same problem. Consider, for example, a patient who is seen in the ER for abdominal pain, and a day later, follows-up with her primary care provider. Coordination of care is made more difficult by the fact that the second provider doesn't have access to the lab information from the earlier visit. In order to minimize delays, providers will often repeat the testing. This is done because it is often a faster way of getting the information as compared to signing the release, faxing it over, and waiting for the reply. Duplicate testing is an incredible waste on health care resources. Our vision is for a future where an empowered patient can use their Health Security Number to access labs and tests from any site of service and share it with anybody they wish.

Increased Privacy

Current laws require providers to safeguard your health records, but how would you know if an unauthorized person was looking into your chart? With paper charts, you would never know. Patients must take it on faith that the many people with access to their record, often times including ancillary personnel such as janitors, cleaning staff, etc., will not abuse those rights. And if someone breaches that confidence, no one will know. The situation with electronic records is not much better. Although an audit trail is often created, patients are rarely notified of access to their records. We believe that we can build an infrastructure where patients using a Health Security Number can get notified when their cloud-based record is accessed and they can decide whether that access is appropriate or not.

In regards to data security, if a provider takes your office chart to the hospital, and it unknowingly falls out of his briefcase and onto the ground, your records become immediately accessible to the first person who picks it up.

On the other hand, if your Health Security Number falls out of your pocket and is picked up by the same stranger, he would find that your encrypted health records are protected by your login and password.

Bridging the Divide

The Health Security Number serves as a bridge to unify records between paper-based providers and providers using branded electronic records. One of the biggest barriers to adoption of more robust systems, is the cost incurred by the provider or facility. We are committed to showing providers how they can use our innovative platform to transition to a paper-free office at no cost to them. We need your voice and support to help get this word out.

What is the Purpose of Crowd-Funding?

The purpose of this crowd funding initiative is to raise sufficient funds to build an open-source software solution to operate a web portal for patient access.

Clients will ultimately be able to obtain their Health Security Number on demand using our proprietary technology, use the portal as a pathway to accessing records, and use our "fax-to-cloud" functionality to keep the information perpetually up-to-date.

We will create all of the software and bridging solutions necessary to accomplish these tasks.

This software authoring effort will require additional funding in excess of what is customary for normal software development and deployment. This is partly because of the safeguards and regulatory constraints governing the privacy of medical records. A significant amount of IT support will be necessary during the initial program launch, during the migration of legacy records, and during the continuous update process after records integration.

Who is Medical Informatics?

We are doctors, professors, and business leaders who have come together to forge a new paradigm in medical record-keeping.  But more importantly, we are also patients and consumers of health care ourselves.  We want better transparency and improved access to records, because we, too, are patients from time-to-time.

Our team brings a unique skill-set to the table including a deep understanding of the role of record integration in modern medicine, the technical capability to develop the technological components necessary for the project, and the business savvy to make the business plan succeed.  These three ingredients are not enough to succeed, however.  Your support is an essential element in this endeavor.  With strong backing from the Indiegogo community, we can have a stronger voice in making positive changes in health care today.

What You Can Do...

This project can only succeed with your help. If you share our vision, you can help us succeed.

  • If you can contribute, please do so. We have provided a number of different pledge amounts and we hope you find one that is suitable for you. One of the metrics of success of this project is the number of pledges that a new idea like this receives. Each pledge is an undeniable vote of confidence.
  • Get the word out to the world. Share our information with your family and friends on Facebook and Twitter. Tell your doctor or provider about us (we'd be happy to talk to them, too, by the way!). Chances are that if you think that this is a "good idea," then others do as well. You can direct them to this link which will point them to this site.
  • Join us! Become a part of our extended team. If you believe (like we do) that this is the next big thing in health care, then join us in this revolution! Your voice and your story can make all the difference in the world! Contact your local newspaper or media outlet and tell them about us. Discuss this topic with policy makers and your politicians. Keep the dialogue alive and you can help forever change the way medicine is practiced in this country.

A Note About the Perks...

We hope you appreciate the value of the perks offered.  Please keep in mind that while many providers will not charge you any additional fees, some providers may directly charge you an administrative fee before they give you access to your records.  Those fees do not come to us and they are separate from the perk contribution levels listed here.  We hope these perks can bring you and your family better health through unprecedented access to your own records!

Thank you!

We wish to thank the many people who have made it possible for us to before you today.

We are grateful to all of the wonderful entrepreneurs, business leaders, health care workers and those in the position of medical leadership who have assisted us and steered us in the right direction. We are grateful to our strategic corporate partners without whose hard work and effort, we would not be able to realize this dream.

We are also grateful to you, the Indiegogo community, for giving us this opportunity to showcase this project. Thank you for your support!

Secure access to our open-sourced software portal (developed with your generous contribution) to generate your own unique personal Health Security Number;
A physical card imprinted with your unique Health Security Number;
Your secure cloud-space, reserved for your personal health records;
Migration of all legacy records (paper & electronic) from any number of sources to your cloud-space;
Access to our "fax-to-cloud" functionality and other bridging solutions to keep your records perpetually up-to-date;
Access to software enabling private, secure access to your records using your Mac, PC, smartphone, or tablet, and;
Electronic notification to you when someone views or changes anything in your cloud-space.

Why is this a "good" thing?
Our Health Security Number and approach to medical records is beneficial in so many ways. Let's discuss just few of them.
Reduction of Medical Errors
Having easier access to you own records gives you a better chance of catching medical errors in your chart. Although existing laws insure that patients have the right to ask for their records, very few patients actually exercise the right because of the paperwork and fees associated with a records release. Our vision, is that eventually you'll be able to see your provider, receive a text notification that your records have been updated, and be able to review the note for that encounter as soon as its generated. This unprecedented level of transparency will reduce errors associated with erroneous charting, by empowering patients through easier and seamless access to their own records.
Elimination of Redundant Testing
Patients are often time seen by providers at different sites for the same problem. Consider, for example, a patient who is seen in the ER for abdominal pain, and a day later, follows-up with her primary care provider. Coordination of care is made more difficult by the fact that the second provider doesn't have access to the lab information from the earlier visit. In order to minimize delays, providers will often repeat the testing. This is done because it is often a faster way of getting the information as compared to signing the release, faxing it over, and waiting for the reply. Duplicate testing is an incredible waste on health care resources. Our vision is for a future where an empowered patient can use their Health Security Number to access labs and tests from any site of service and share it with anybody they wish.
Increased Privacy
Current laws require providers to safeguard your health records, but how would you know if an unauthorized person was looking into your chart? With paper charts, you would never know. Patients must take it on faith that the many people with access to their record, often times including ancillary personnel such as janitors, cleaning staff, etc., will not abuse those rights. And if someone breaches that confidence, no one will know. The situation with electronic records is not much better. Although an audit trail is often created, patients are rarely notified of access to their records. We believe that we can build an infrastructure where patients using a Health Security Number can get notified when their cloud-based record is accessed and they can decide whether that access is appropriate or not.
In regards to data security, if a provider takes your office chart to the hospital, and it unknowingly falls out of his briefcase and onto the ground, your records become immediately accessible to the first person who picks it up.
On the other hand, if your Health Security Number falls out of your pocket and is picked up by the same stranger, he would find that your encrypted health records are protected by your login and password.
Bridging the Divide
The Health Security Number serves as a bridge to unify records between paper-based providers and providers using branded electronic records. One of the biggest barriers to adoption of more robust systems, is the cost incurred by the provider or facility. We are committed to showing providers how they can use our innovative platform to transition to a paper-free office at no cost to them. We need your voice and support to help get this word out.
What is the Purpose of Crowd-Funding?
The purpose of this crowd funding initiative is to raise sufficient funds to build an open-source software solution to operate a web portal for patient access.
Clients will ultimately be able to obtain their Health Security Number on demand using our proprietary technology, use the portal as a pathway to accessing records, and use our "fax-to-cloud" functionality to keep the information perpetually up-to-date.
We will create all of the software and bridging solutions necessary to accomplish these tasks.
This software authoring effort will require additional funding in excess of what is customary for normal software development and deployment. This is partly because of the safeguards and regulatory constraints governing the privacy of medical records. A significant amount of IT support will be necessary during the initial program launch, during the migration of legacy records, and during the continuous update process after records integration.
Who is Medical Informatics?
We are doctors, professors, and business leaders who have come together to forge a new paradigm in medical record-keeping.  But more importantly, we are also patients and consumers of health care ourselves.  We want better transparency and improved access to records, because we, too, are patients from time-to-time.

Our team brings a unique skill-set to the table including a deep understanding of the role of record integration in modern medicine, the technical capability to develop the technological components necessary for the project, and the business savvy to make the business plan succeed.  These three ingredients are not enough to succeed, however.  Your support is an essential element in this endeavor.  With strong backing from the Indiegogo community, we can have a stronger voice in making positive changes in health care today.
What You Can Do...
This project can only succeed with your help. If you share our vision, you can help us succeed.


If you can contribute, please do so. We have provided a number of different pledge amounts and we hope you find one that is suitable for you. One of the metrics of success of this project is the number of pledges that a new idea like this receives. Each pledge is an undeniable vote of confidence.

Get the word out to the world. Share our information with your family and friends on Facebook and Twitter. Tell your doctor or provider about us (we'd be happy to talk to them, too, by the way!). Chances are that if you think that this is a "good idea," then others do as well. You can direct them to this link which will point them to this site.

Join us! Become a part of our extended team. If you believe (like we do) that this is the next big thing in health care, then join us in this revolution! Your voice and your story can make all the difference in the world! Contact your local newspaper or media outlet and tell them about us. Discuss this topic with policy makers and your politicians. Keep the dialogue alive and you can help forever change the way medicine is practiced in this country.

A Note About the Perks...
We hope you appreciate the value of the perks offered.  Please keep in mind that while many providers will not charge you any additional fees, some providers may directly charge you an administrative fee before they give you access to your records.  Those fees do not come to us and they are separate from the perk contribution levels listed here.  We hope these perks can bring you and your family better health through unprecedented access to your own records!
Thank you!
We wish to thank the many people who have made it possible for us to before you today.
We are grateful to all of the wonderful entrepreneurs, business leaders, health care workers and those in the position of medical leadership who have assisted us and steered us in the right direction. We are grateful to our strategic corporate partners without whose hard work and effort, we would not be able to realize this dream.
We are also grateful to you, the Indiegogo community, for giving us this opportunity to showcase this project. Thank you for your support!

story:
We are no longer crowd funding but for a short period you can still join over 450 supporters who have purchased over 625 FilterWatch devices. Head over to:

www.pogtech.com/filterwatch 

and pre-order your FilterWatch today!


The filter on your heater and A/C helps keep your air clean in your house, but when it gets clogged, it causes your system to work harder than it has to, and less effectively at that. The Department of Energy says that a clean filter can reduce your HVAC energy consumption 5-15%. As the filter gets more clogged, you end up spending more and more on energy, and your air quality diminishes.

Most filters are sold with a suggested change date, but there’s two main problems with that: first, every house is different, so those suggestions might be right for some people and completely off for others, and in between for everyone else. Several factors determine how quickly your filter will become ineffective including the number of family members, pets, carpet, filter location, susceptibility to allergens, and home location just to name a few. Second, we sometimes forget when we installed a filter, or when the suggested date comes along to change them.  

 

What results is extra stress on your HVAC (shortening its life), extra energy used (costing you money), and compromised indoor air quality. While some HVAC thermostats tell occupants when to change filters, those suggestions are based more on run time than on actual need, meaning you may change filters too frequently or too infrequently...as we said, all houses are different, so why not get the right answer, the one based on data?


The Birth of FilterWatch

After getting fed up with $800 electricity bills, I realized that I had no real way to tell when the filters on my A/C needed changing. This has lead us here with FilterWatch, a simple device that measures how clogged your air filter is and alerts you when its time to be changed. FilterWatch monitors the airflow going into your filter. Slow airflow means less filtering and longer run times! When the airflow gets to be too slow, an alarm on the FilterWatch will go off. Simple and effective, and the benefits are huge!

Check this out

If your filter is clogged 20%, your HVAC runs 20% longer. So if your HVAC was running 5 hours a day with a new filter, its now running 6 hours a day. A typical HVAC unit will use 3kW in an hour. So figure that extra 1 hour will cost you $.30 if your service provider charges you $.1/kWh. That doesn't sound like a lot but...

  • if you ran it that way for 30 days, that's $9 (for 1 extra hour every 24hrs). Over a year, it would amount to ~$100 if you’re consistently running your HVAC with a somewhat clogged filter. If your avg. price/kWh is $.15, that's $13.5 per month, or over $150 per year. In Hawaii, where electricity is about $0.35/kWh, you’re talking ~$350 per year!
  • if you have 2 HVAC units, double those figures.
  • if your system runs 15hrs/day in your peak season, triple them!
  • Turns out while developing the prototypes, I learned my filters are 30-35% clogged after 20 days. So that $9 we started with, might actually be $15 depending on your own home’s individual usage. FilterWatch will pinpoint the best time for you to change your filter based on your situation. 
  • HVAC units can use anywhere between 2 and 5 kW depending on the size. We used 3 in our numbers above.

footnote: If you believe the numbers we used are high, check out your average electricity rate HERE.

Just attach FilterWatch to a vent in your house (return vent is best), press the start button and wait for FilterWatch to alert you when your filter needs changing.


I'm going to save a boat load of money and we expect a lot of you will as well whether its cooling in the summer or heating in the winter.

Most of us will spend over 90% of our lives indoors and over 50% of that will be in our own homes. 

This makes our HVAC system(s) an integral part of our LIVES!

For most of us,  our HVAC system is the primary method for filtering the air that we breathe AND it is the #1 source of energy usage in our homes. With something so important in our lives, it makes sense that we should pay extra attention to make sure that it is working as efficiently as possible.

Thanks for your support!


The Air that You Breathe

Indoor dust, mites, pollen, and dander are major triggers of asthma and other respiratory aliments. One of the best methods of limiting these allergens in your home, is to trap them in your HVAC filter.  As your air filters get clogged with these allergens, they become less and less effective. Lower air flow through the filter and poor seating due to flexing of the filter are just a couple reasons they become less effective at trapping particles.

Check out these asthma prevention methods on WebMD, making sure your filter is clean is right up there near the top and is certainly one of the least costly items to implement.

asthma prevention methods

Are your HEPA filters protecting your family? They might be for a while, but they get clogged as well and their effectiveness is quickly reduced as the airflow is reduced by clogging. Many people install HEPA filters in systems that are marginally designed and the added filtering reduces the air speed to a point that many allergens are too heavy to be picked up by the filter system. The energy costs sky-rocket because the system runs longer. FilterWatch can help you decide what filter might be best for your system.

 

Check out what that looks like in my house when I neglect the filter:

Dust escapes past filter

FilterWatch will tell you to change your filter when it is ready to be changed based on how dirty it is. 

The condition of your filter directly affects its ability to clean the air in your home AND when your HVAC filter is clean, it is one of your best defenses against airborne contaminants. Check out the information at the following link. It summarizes several studies related to the effectiveness of different filters, whole home filtration, and room filtration all related to controlling indoor allergens. If you or your family are affected by respiratory ailments such as asthma please read:

 THIS SUMMARY OF SEVERAL STUDIES!

 

The Energy that You Consume

The Department of Energy states that maintaining a clean air filter will reduce your HVAC energy consumption by as much as 5-15%.

http://energy.gov/energysaver/articles/maintaining-your-air-conditioner

Why is it that many people forget to change the air filters in their house if they are able to save that kind of money by doing so? It can be a nasty chore. Bump it on the way out and all the dust collected is on the floor or your head. 

It's all about getting as much of the hot or cold air as your system can generate into the house as fast as possible so the system can turn off. A clean filter with proper duct sealing and insulation in your home will get you the maximum benefit from your HVAC system.

When is the RIGHT TIME to change your air filters?

Some people like to change their air filters every 30 days and why wouldn't you when the label on the air filter says "30 day filter"?

Some people like to look through the return vent to see if the filter is dirty or 'bending'.

What if your air  filter is already 25% clogged after 30 days or when you look at it? Worse yet, what if you forget to check your filter for a couple extra weeks?

If  your air filter should be changed at 30 days because it is already 25% clogged and you wait until 60 days, You are likely wasting a minimum of $25 on your energy bill for that extra 30 days! (See chart below)

This link will take you to the study by Old Dominion University that shows the added cost of electricity each month given a 23% clogged air filter. It's over $13 per month with just 5 hrs of running per day at $.1 per kWh! A 20% increase over the cost of running with a clean air filter. A summer here in AZ and your system is probably running 12-16 hours a day! You can see that during our peak, its imperative to keep a clean filter.

Old Dominion Study

Check the average price per kWh for your state here.

Check out a related chart with ESTIMATED EXTRA ENERGY COSTS based on the clogged % of an HVAC air filter. These numbers match up pretty close to the Old Dominion study as well as the Department of Energy's 5-15%.

Still not convinced? Just read the first few lines of this study funded by the Department of Energy back in 2003. "The most common problems affecting residential and light commercial heating, ventilation, and air-conditioning (HVAC) systems are slow refrigerant leaks and dirty air filters".

DOE Funded Study

How does FilterWatch operate?

FilterWatch comes with a small mounting bracket that gets attached to the rim of the return vent (near the filter) or a room vent. A start button is used to tell the monitor that a new filter has been installed. Snap FilterWatch to the mounting bracket and from this point on there is nothing to do. An LED and a BEEPER will tell you when the filter needs to be changed. Check out what it looks like installed (this is a model that we are targeting):

When FilterWatch measures an air flow change around 25% lower than the initial reading, the alarm will go off about once every minute until the user resets the alarm or changes the air filter. (The clog % is user settable)

How far along are we?

We've built several prototype FilterWatch monitors to work out issues with different readings based on part variance and manufacturing variance. 

Checking monitors against another anemometer.

You can follow along our progress and understand some key decisions we have to make along the way. Just go to our blog HERE.

The REWARDS

FilterWatch BASIC

This is the simplest and lowest cost option. Attach it to a return vent, start it, wait for led/beeper to alert you that your filter is clogged. For a low battery, the alert will be different. The BASIC model has a connector that will support a relay output, a serial bus, and other signals as needed. ---UPDATE--- we have added an LCD to all models that will allow for added functionality.

FilterWatch WirelessZ

This is our initial wireless version. We will support the latest ZigBee home automation systems. We support SmartThings, WigWag, and Almond+.

Select this model if you want.....

- a filter shipped to your door when yours is clogged.

- a notification sent to your phone

- to record data over a period of time

The PLAN

These plans are subject to change but they are targets as of Oct 1, 2012. See updates on our blog.

With the funds we hope to gather here we will have the package professionally designed and put into molds. The current prototype PCB will be made much smaller but our focus is on manufacturing simplicity and reliability versus having the smallest lowest cost device we can build.

Flexible funding a physical device can be tricky as much of our costs are related to volume purchasing of the hardware and volume manufacturing. Mike and I are prepared to partially manufacture the PCBs by hand but most likely will only be doing the final assembly and test of the first 500-1000 devices. The "fund priority" below is an example of how the funds will be dispersed depending the amount available. You can see below that priority 1 line items are those things that we MUST have done because we lack the internal resources. 

Fund priority:

1. Package design

1. Package molds

1. Manufacture PCB/ Buy Electronic parts

1-2. PCB Assembly

*. PCB Layout - internally 

*. Firmware - internally

*. Final Assembly and test - internally

Manufacturing and Scale-ability

Our local PCBA partners are fully capable of scaling to  thousands of assembled PCBs per week and we will design the PCB to be 95% assembled using automation (LCD and Battery compartments must be hand soldered). 

After the LCD and battery compartment are soldered on, we estimate it will take 1 minute to install the PCB into the housing. 

We have a 2-piece housing and the intent is to use screws to attach the halves together. This eliminates difficult issues with snap together plastic that is often the reason for initial products missing delivery deadlines.

To facilitate complete, but fast testing, we have designed B.I.T. (built in tests) into the firmware that can be initiated through an external connector. (A benefit of avionics experience) This allows us to test buttons, leds, LCD, radio and air-speed sensor operation in less than 2 minutes per monitor. This testing includes calibration of the sensor that gets stored in non-volatile memory.

We are also dumping the B.I.T. results out to a database so we can further determine the need for individual calibration for future ultra high precision operation.

Schedule

The schedule below is based meeting our fund raise in the desired window. Please be aware that under the Philips page, if we are selected as a top project, our fund raise may be re-opened even if it did not reach our ultimate goal. --UPDATE- Campaigns do not re-open, so we are targeting the time frames stated below.

Nov: First molded parts and first assembled PCBs for validation

Dec: First fully assembled PCB, and plastic parts start arriving for final assembly and test.

Jan: Final Assembly and Test complete

Jan/Feb 2014: Product start shipping

FilterWatch Wireless

Jan: Wireless Testing and FCC certification - TBD

Feb 2014: Manufacturing and test

Mar 2014: Product start shipping

The TEAM

Mike Mayer (Partner) - SIma Engineering

John Pollock (Partner) - Innovation Play

Dr. Brent Stephens (Advisor), Illinios Institute of Technology - BIO

Please be aware that under the Philips page, if we are selected as a top project, our fund raise may be re-opened even if it did not reach our ultimate goal. --UPDATE- Campaigns do not re-open, so we are targeting the time frames stated below.
Nov: First molded parts and first assembled PCBs for validation
Dec: First fully assembled PCB, and plastic parts start arriving for final assembly and test.
Jan: Final Assembly and Test complete
Jan/Feb 2014: Product start shipping
FilterWatch Wireless
Jan: Wireless Testing and FCC certification - TBD
Feb 2014: Manufacturing and test
Mar 2014: Product start shipping
The TEAM

Mike Mayer (Partner) - SIma Engineering
John Pollock (Partner) - Innovation Play

Dr. Brent Stephens (Advisor), Illinios Institute of Technology - BIO

story:
Short Summary

My dad - Paul Emmanuel passed away in the ICU at Mt. Hope hospital on October 28th, 2014 in Trinidad. He had surgery on October 10th to remove a ruptured gallbladder at St. Clair Medical. His lungs became infected and he was rushed to the ICU at St. Clair on October 12th. His medical costs rose everyday. 

  • My name is Francesco Emmanuel - his son. My family lives in Trinidad. We have always been a very close-knit family.
  • Losing our father was the hardest thing we've ever had to go through, especially as he suffered for almost three weeks. Every day we hoped he would be getting better, but instead his lungs never recovered, we had to move him from St. Clair to MT. Hope on October 22nd because the costs were way beyond our reach. He developed a secondary infection and went into cardiac arrest on October 27th, he slowly slipped away till his passing on October 28th, 2014.
  • We have had a wonderful life with our father and we just cannot believe he's gone.

What we need

  • Currently, his medical bill is TTS273,000 (he was admitted Oct 9th, 2014), with the ICU costing approximately TTS20,000 - 25,000/day. We had no idea what the cost was until we got an interim bill the next day. 
  • We're were desperately hoping he would be transferred to another ward by end of week, but instead we had to wait almost a week to get a bed in a public ICU, because his condition never really improved. 
  • If we don't get the funds we will look into other fundraising options - family, friends, bank loans, concerts.

What You Get

I am a musician, and am working on a new solo record, which will be out early 2015. You can find out all about me at www.cescoemmanuel.com. I will gladly give my new album (and ALL my previous music) for free to anyone who contributes to this campaign.

The Impact

We have never done this sort of campaign before, never had to, but your contribution, will help us to pick up the pieces of our lives after my dad's passing. Your contribution will help sustain my family. We are not a rich family by material standards, but we've been blessed with many happy years together. And that's truly what life is about. Those intangible moments that money can't buy. My dad has always been a kind, generous, loving father, husband and brother to all his siblings.

Risks & Challenges

Everyday we're trying to be as positive as possible, but it is so hard to lose someone who meant so much to all of us. My mother is also not well, (she lives with chronic pain caused by advanced osteoarthritis). My father was her main emotional and physical support at home. She misses him terribly. 

We are hoping with these funds to help pay off dad's medical expenses, because the sad fact is, these bills are still being owed to St. Clair. This is a medical and financial nightmare that we never, ever saw coming.

I know it may not be possible for everyone to help financially, and that's ok. Can you say a prayer, and spread the word online - please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you very much. 


God Bless you all.

Francesco

story:
Erin tried for years to get pregnant. 

She's finally a mother of two beautiful little boys, Vance, 2 yrs and August, 5 months. Her husband, George, and sons absolutely adore her. 

After she was diagnosed, she looked at me incredulously and with tears in her eyes, and said:

"I waited so many years to have these babies, how can this be happening now?"

After having just recently given birth, she thought some of the symptoms she was experiencing were just a result of that. She also put off going to the hospital because she was reluctant to leave her little boys.

She needs to go away for treatment, which will cost much more than the family can afford.

Erin's situation is just about as bad as it gets, but with your help she'll be able to get the care she needs to live as many years as possible.

As much as our hearts are breaking for Erin and her little boys, they are breaking just as hard for George, who is more in love with her than ever.

"My friends are always asking me to go out on the weekends, but I just want to be with Erin." 

Please help us save her life.

story:
WHAT IT IS

During my time as a chemistry student pursuing a college degree, I saw first-hand how many students relied on energy drinks to sustain them through their study sessions or keep them awake during work.  Energy beverages provided necessary energy, but at the cost of huge amounts of sugar and a nasty tasting, toxic-looking liquid.  Of course, sugarless versions were available, but many of these just tasted even nastier!

Students in high school and college as well as professionals in the working world rely on energy products in order to compete or even just to stay concurrent.  It is the sad truth that many students even turn to illegally obtained prescription ADHD medications or other drugs to just try to maintain their focus and motivation to get them through their day or class.  There had to be an alternative that didn’t require huge amounts of sugar, toxic tasting liquids, or illegal drugs.  The concept of VimGum was born.

VimGum combines the potency of a leading 12 oz. energy drink along with memory and cognitive enhancing nootropic “smart drugs” (don’t worry, they are the legal kind) in the convenience and enjoyment of a single piece of chewing gum.

VimGum contains a potent proprietary formula which energizes, motivates, and enhances for several hours.  Now if you are thinking that VimGum is just a caffeinated gum, you are dead wrong.  VimGum contains powerful ingredients that will provide stimulation and focus even to the person who has developed a tall tolerance to caffeine since the primary ingredients are not caffeine, although caffeine is also part of VimGum.  The unique formula is comprised of several unique ingredients which work synergistically in vivo to produce a dynamic and focused increase in energy, concentration, and drive.

But VimGum doesn’t stop there.  Unlike other energy products, VimGum also contains a proprietary nootropic blend.  For those of you who are unfamiliar, nootropics are substances which increase mental acuity, memory, and problem-solving.  While a standard energy drink may be able to keep you awake a little longer for your study session, VimGum will actually help you learn faster and more comprehensively.  Skeptical?  After just one piece, you soon won’t be.

We have established that VimGum is not your typical energy product.  In addition to suiting itself to academic study and professional work ability, VimGum also provides physical stimulation that makes it useful for every athlete and for every work out.  The stimulation and energy provided mean that you are able to train harder, faster, longer, and with more vitality than would otherwise be possible.  In fact, VimGum contains a powerful blend of natural herbal extracts and modern age chemistry that creates a powerful thermogenic effect that increases resting metabolism so that even if you are doing nothing more than sitting at your desk or lying on the couch, your resting metabolism will be increased over its baseline so that your caloric expenditure will be higher.  What exactly does that mean?  Basically your metabolism will increase so that fats are more readily broken down, cellular energy is more readily available, and thus more energy is available to your body and mind.

So what exactly is in VimGum?  The individual ingredients include various natural stimulants including caffeine, nootropics, vitamins, and thermogenic substances; but the true “magic” is in the synergistic effect that the substances produce in the human body when combined, allowing for an extremely potent effect from such a small amount of material in a single piece of chewing gum, especially when compared with the huge amounts of toxins and nasty chemicals present in so many energy drinks.  VimGum is based on extensive biochemical and nutrition research in order to provide an energizing experience unlike any other.  Below is a description of the major active ingredients:


WHAT'S IN IT

-- B vitamins:  these are natural energy boosters which increase the body's metabolism of carbohydrates and fats to increase available energy levels*

-- Synephrine:  an extract of bitter orange, this chemical stimulates resting metabolism so that more energy is available.  This has dual effects; first, it enhances weight loss by increasing energy expenditure even when you are not exercising or exerting yourself, and second it provides additional available energy to your body and mind*

-- Yohimbine: extract of yohimbe, this powerful natural chemical is both a powerful stimulant and a mild aphrodisiac*

-- L-Theanine:  this nootropic chemical enhances working memory, improves learning curve, and smooths any jitters that exist from other stimulants*

-- Caffeine Anhydrous: caffeine works synergistically with the other natural energy chemicals to provide superior energy, but without the usual excessive jitteriness of other caffeine products and with an overall higher potency*

-- Huperzine A:  this powerful chemical increases mental acuity as well short-term memory*

-- Vinpocetine:  a powerful memory and cognitive enhancer, this compound provides clear benefits for any study or work session*

-- Ginseng:  a natural chinese herb, this plant contains natural, healthy stimulants and focus-enhancing compounds*

-- Noopept:  this incredibly powerful nootropic acts on the acetylcholine system of the brain, increasing long-term memory with regular use so that you can retain more information and for longer periods*

-- CDP Choline:  providing essential choline to the brain, CDP Choline replenishes the brain's supply of acetylcholine precursor which in turn allows the brain to encode memories more efficiently*


WHO WE ARE

My name is Ricky, and I am currently a biochemistry and physics double major at Florida State University.  After seeing just how much of a need there was for energy drink alternatives besides illegal ADHD pills or speed, I came up with the idea of developing a new energizing formula that was compact and efficient, but would also provide incredible stimulation and focus to the student, professional, or athlete.  After 16 months of research, development, and friends who put up with me while I made them chew piece after piece, VimGum finally has a tasty yet powerful composition which I want to now be able to share with the world.  Unfortunately, I am still a college student working my way through school and cannot afford to move this project forward anymore without help.  That’s where you come in.

HOW YOU CAN HELP

In order to bring VimGum to market, we need to meet minimum order quantities for all the ingredients and packaging for an entire batch of gum.  For us, this translates into a $1000 minimum goal.  Of course, we would love to raise even more capital and awareness and take this product even farther!  So to that end, additional benefits will be provided if the following milestones are met:

$1000 Raised – Yay!  Minimum order quantities are met for a small batch!

  This means we can successfully produce our first full batch of VimGum and bring product to market!

$8000 Raised – Woohoo!!  More variety!!

  If we can reach $8000 in funds raised, we will have the funds to develop two additional flavors of VimGum!

$25,000 Raised  -- AMAZING!!  Let's get VimGum into stores!

  Your help to reach this milestone enables us to build enough inventory to move into the retail space so that you and everyone else can enjoy VimGum on a regular basis with the ease of just picking up a pack at the store.

$42,000 Raised  -- OMG, Here we come Europe!!
  Due to our unlimited resources and the tough regulations imposed by many countries on food products and dietary supplements, we are currently restricted to the United States for sales.  However, if we reach this benchmark, we will be able to bring VimGum to many European countries as well!  How cool is that?!
$50,000 Raised -- VimMint:  I dream this day will come
  If we are able to reach the $50,000 mark during this campaign, we will provide each contributer of $15 or more with a free sample of VimMint, our proprietary energy mint developed from the chemistry and nutrition technology built into VimGum.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.  This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

story:
Again for your body temperature

We created this smart forehead thermometer to provide the families with a convenient and enjoyable way for management of their health.  The products are designed using the medical grade materials and technology. Using the Comper Health App, we also provide the tools to make tracking and understanding your family’s health as easy as possible. With the information that the Health App paired with our monitoring tools provides, you can make informed decisions about every aspect of your family’s health.

How vital our body temperature to us?  

The body temperature is one of the most important vital signs for people monitoring their health issues or diseases conditions related with cancer, immune system, endocrine system and common infections, it is also the base, which physicians to diagnose.

Get reading your vital signs within a second 

The Comper smart forehead thermometer is designed to make taking a body temperature as easy as possible. It's always on standby for your measurement. Slightly press on the button for wakeup and immediately press again for reading that can be done within a second. Every detail of its design has been thought through, from its simple and rugged design to its easy to use controls. Each measurement is highly accurate, with only 0.2℃ margin of error.

 Enable the body temperature data visible and useful  

Comper Health App visualizes the body temperature ranges, trends and the moments of reading and allows people to utilize their body data in various scenarios of their daily life. It’s not designed just for reading and recording the body data, it plays a major role as your smart assistant in the days you are not well.

 

 

Overview

Born for professional management 

When connected to the Comper Health App, it’s possible to track any number of individual’s temperature measurements, making it suitable for any family, from large to small. It is even suitable for use by medical professionals so that each client or patient can be tracked and managed individually. The app combines temperature information from the Thermometer with body type and composition, weight, and exercise frequency to build a fitness model for each person. The thermometer will take into account the user's age and their expected temperature when tracking data, whether they are a newborn, baby, toddler, child, adolescent, or adult. Readings can also be easily shared with your doctor or medical professional. 

Making body data easy to get and use

Comprehend body temperature with your love

 

Comper on Media

Psychological design

The design incorporates developmental psychology, taking into account the feelings of parents and the baby. It avoids the use of the traditional gun-type (vertical) operation. The best part about it is its ability to make the temperature measurement process thoroughly amicable and caring.

Friendly and caring gesture

 

 

Visualize your reading

Comper health make everything about your body temperature visualized including the process you get it   


Paring with Comper Health App

 

 

Visualized measuring process

 

Soft and safe

 

Biocompatible TPU with special soften process

 

Fast and accurate

With rigorous contact temperature measurement technology, there is no compensation algorithm used for non-contact temperature measurement, which can read more accurate body temperature at second’s speed. 

Fast and accurate

 

Built-in body temperature classification 

The Comper Health App has built-in subdivided, based on the age of the baby, the system automatically sets the temperature standards for newborns, babies, toddlers, children, adolescents, and adults as well medical advice. 

Body temperature classification based on the age

 

Curve changes

Open the Comper Health App, and each temperature measurement result can be synchronized to the temperature curve of the corresponding family member. The trend of temperature changes at each time, day, month, and year can be seen at a glance. 

Curve the change in your body

 

Manage as many as you like 

There is no upper limit on the number of multi-user management of the Comper Health App, which can meet the temperature management needs of families, schools, and even professional medical institutions. 

Multiple uses management

 

Connect by data

Each temperature measurement can be shared with friends in the form of a friendly content, shared with doctors in the form of medical records, or shared with schools or companies in the form of excuse letter.

 

 

With you anywhere 

The product comes with a one-button minimalist design for boot + temperature measurement. There are many intelligent features presented in the app. Its body length of only 13 cm makes it compact and portable. 

 13cm length for length

 

Making  body data easy to get and use 

Making body data easy to get and use

 

Keep your data anyway 

 

 

Shooting for  operation process

 

Find the differences

 

Rewards 

 

Timeline for project

Let's stay connected

About the Creator

Founder & CEO Du Han

Du is a serial woman entrepreneur who has a passion for developing the digital healthcare industry. Over the last four years, she has conquered the digital healthcare industry with innovative and unique devices that facilitate families health. With her extensive medical background, knowledge about medical practice and investment, Du Han founded Comper Healthcare.

Du Han leaded Comper team to join the Baby Tech Summit at CES 2018 as a speaker and had Comper Smart Fertility Tracker as a finalist in the Best of Baby Tech Awards 2018. She is Graduated from the Capital University of Medical Science. With 12 years experience in the medical industry, Du Han was chief agent of orthopedic consumables and heart stents of LEPU Medical, Co-Founder of Regent Capital, an investor in PING AN HEALTH, she is been nominated for the Women in Investment Awards 2018 and Business Women's Awards 2018.

 

Nice to meet you

Group of experienced and energetic people with same values, our passion to develop the digital healthcare industry reunite us. We all believe that teamwork will lead us to success and a great product need a team with a perfect blend of creativity and technical wizardry.

Why we crowdfund

We decided to back again to Indiegogo mainly for 2 reasons, supporting the marketing plan for the new Thermometer and offering an exclusive rewards plan for indiegogo community after the pleasant previous experience.

By reaching our goal we will be able to go into the global market easily.

 

Referral Program

We are also opening up a referral program that you can participate in and earn commissions for helping us spread the word! you can contact us for more information

Risks and challenges

We believe that any project or idea came with its own risks and challenges, in the first stage our challenges was to bring this device to life and we did it, regarding other risks we believe that almost inexistent as it's our second campaign and the only existing risk in the shipping time but we are working to make sure that our backers will get their devices on time.

Comprehend body temperature with your love
 
Comper on Media


Psychological design
The design incorporates developmental psychology, taking into account the feelings of parents and the baby. It avoids the use of the traditional gun-type (vertical) operation. The best part about it is its ability to make the temperature measurement process thoroughly amicable and caring.

Friendly and caring gesture

 
 
Visualize your reading
Comper health make everything about your body temperature visualized including the process you get it   
Paring with Comper Health App  Visualized measuring process Soft and safe Biocompatible TPU with special soften process Fast and accurateWith rigorous contact temperature measurement technology, there is no compensation algorithm used for non-contact temperature measurement, which can read more accurate body temperature at second’s speed. Fast and accurate Built-in body temperature classification The Comper Health App has built-in subdivided, based on the age of the baby, the system automatically sets the temperature standards for newborns, babies, toddlers, children, adolescents, and adults as well medical advice. Body temperature classification based on the age Curve changesOpen the Comper Health App, and each temperature measurement result can be synchronized to the temperature curve of the corresponding family member. The trend of temperature changes at each time, day, month, and year can be seen at a glance. Curve the change in your body Manage as many as you like There is no upper limit on the number of multi-user management of the Comper Health App, which can meet the temperature management needs of families, schools, and even professional medical institutions. Multiple uses management Connect by dataEach temperature measurement can be shared with friends in the form of a friendly content, shared with doctors in the form of medical records, or shared with schools or companies in the form of excuse letter.  With you anywhere The product comes with a one-button minimalist design for boot + temperature measurement. There are many intelligent features presented in the app. Its body length of only 13 cm makes it compact and portable.  13cm length for length Making  body data easy to get and use Making body data easy to get and use Keep your data anyway   Shooting for  operation process Find the differences Rewards  Timeline for projectLet's stay connectedAbout the CreatorFounder & CEO Du HanDu is a serial woman entrepreneur who has a passion for developing the digital healthcare industry. Over the last four years, she has conquered the digital healthcare industry with innovative and unique devices that facilitate families health. With her extensive medical background, knowledge about medical practice and investment, Du Han founded Comper Healthcare.Du Han leaded Comper team to join the Baby Tech Summit at CES 2018 as a speaker and had Comper Smart Fertility Tracker as a finalist in the Best of Baby Tech Awards 2018. She is Graduated from the Capital University of Medical Science. With 12 years experience in the medical industry, Du Han was chief agent of orthopedic consumables and heart stents of LEPU Medical, Co-Founder of Regent Capital, an investor in PING AN HEALTH, she is been nominated for the Women in Investment Awards 2018 and Business Women's Awards 2018. Nice to meet youGroup of experienced and energetic people with same values, our passion to develop the digital healthcare industry reunite us. We all believe that teamwork will lead us to success and a great product need a team with a perfect blend of creativity and technical wizardry.Why we crowdfundWe decided to back again to Indiegogo mainly for 2 reasons, supporting the marketing plan for the new Thermometer and offering an exclusive rewards plan for indiegogo community after the pleasant previous experience.By reaching our goal we will be able to go into the global market easily. Referral ProgramWe are also opening up a referral program that you can participate in and earn commissions for helping us spread the word! you can contact us for more informationRisks and challengesWe believe that any project or idea came with its own risks and challenges, in the first stage our challenges was to bring this device to life and we did it, regarding other risks we believe that almost inexistent as it's our second campaign and the only existing risk in the shipping time but we are working to make sure that our backers will get their devices on time.

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Deanne. In December of 2012, my fiancé Nick was diagnosed with Stage IV Colon Cancer, two weeks before Christmas. In those two weeks he had one major surgery for an ileostomy. This guaranteed that he would be able to eat since the tumor in his colon was too big to let anything pass. He had a second surgery for his smart port, to enable him to receive Chemotherapy which happened after Christmas. Because of his health and the side effects of the Chemo, Nick had to quit a job that he loved.

Ever since that day, I had been his support, caregiver, and main provider. The downside is, that my job is seasonal. And during the summer, I was laid off. This made paying bills near impossible, and even though Nick would get a certain amount from disability, it was never enough to even cover rent. I was rehired, but our bills added up, and now we are playing catch up, and its been very hard since we are almost relying on one pay check.

What We Need & What You Get

We are not asking for much. All we need is $4000 to help us get caught up. The donations that you will be giving us will help us pay for electric, utilities, even those pesky student loans. A small portion of it will go to rent so that we can take comfort in knowing that we have a roof over our heads.

We know that there are other people out there that need help, and we are grateful to those who decide to donate to us. We don't have much to offer, but it may interest you to know that Nick is a artist. One of his talents is photography and image manipulation. To show our appreciation we will send to you a 5x7 printed image of his wonderful work. You the donator, will receive a random print from his own collection. The minimum donation will be $10-$25.

You can see some of his work at his website

http://artisticastudiosgallery.blogspot.com/

The Impact

Your donations will give us both peace of mind and security. With each day full of questions for us and reality always in our face, this will help ease both Nicks mind and myself knowing that we are ok, bill wise at least. We will be able to focus on Nicks health and well being.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you wish to help us get more donations for our cause, feel free to spread the word to your friends, family, co-workers, ect. Prayers and good thoughts are welcomed as well.

story:
For  25+ years I have had the most rewarding job! As a social worker, I've assisted adults with disabilities access the benefits to which they are entitled, but I felt at loose ends when I retired 3 years ago.  During my career, I learned that many times, people with disabilities don't have the extra cash to help them when emergency situations arise and there are no government funds to help them.

Being a passionate quilter, I opened the on-line store, Jolly Ruby, where I sell hand crafted quilted items.  All the money generated in the store goes to the Jolly Ruby Fund to help adults with disabilities when they face unexpected expenses and have no other resources.  While the quilt sales have generated start-up money, the Fund is in need of more. This is where you can help out.  

  • Your donation to this campaign will help buy the air conditioner needed by Jane who has lung disease or will help her pay the larger electricity bill. 
  • Your donation will pay for new tires so Jim can drive to his part time job.
  • Your donation will buy a bus ticket so Sara can attend her mother's funeral in Madison.
  • Your donation will pay for the new refrigerator that Andy needs.
  • Your donation will help with the down payments needed so Amy can live in her own apartment.

What you get when you make a donation to the Jolly Ruby Fund is a unique hand crafted gift made by me.  We want to raise $10,000 and we know we can do it one donation at a time.  For a $500 donation, you'll receive an original lap-sized throw quilt, custom made for you.  For a $250 donation, I will send you a set of 4 placemats. With a $100 donation, you'll get a beautiful table runner.  For a $50 donation, you'll receive a 12" table mat, and for a $25 donation, you'll receive a cute hand-made quilted pot holder.  

More importantly, you'll receive the satisfaction of knowing that you have made a great difference in someones life.

Every dollar in the Jolly Ruby Fund is spent on the unmet financial need of a person with a disability--there are no overhead costs with Jolly Ruby.  We want to raise $10,000 in the next 60 days.  If  we fall short of that goal, we'll still use your donation to help out as best as we can.  

Even if you can't make a donation at this time, it would be great if you would share this information with others so we can reach as many people as possible in this campaign. And, of course, you can shop at my Etsy store, Jolly Ruby, any time of the year.  You'll get a beautiful quilted item for your home as well as contributing to the Jolly Ruby Fund.

We have 60 days to reach our goal of $10,000. Please make your contribution now!  

Thank you so much. 

Barb

story:
Peace and Love everyone. My name is Isis Brantley and I’m a Dallas native. For 25 years I’ve been a pillar of strength and fortitude in my community. My passion is healing through the hair.  I’m known as the Matriarch and pioneer of Natural Hair care and African Braiding in the State of Texas.  I have been instrumental in changing unfair laws related to African Braiding rights and Economic liberty.  I’m the Owner and Founder of The Institute of Ancestral Braiding the only Natural Hair/ African Braiding School in Texas. Our purpose is to train the next generation of African Braiders. 

Since 1980, The Institute of Ancestral Braiding has positioned itself as a leader in natural hair care and adornment advice, services, and products. This is a cultural foundation created in the interest of women, men and children, across the globe who are suffering with damaged hair, scalps, and low self esteem because of these conditions. 

Unlike our competitors we take a completely natural and holistic approach to healing one's head. We do not use over processed chemicals in any of our services and we take the time and care to make sure that all of the services we provide are genuinely advantageous for the customer, not solely for our profit.  


Uniqueness/Distinction

During the mid-90's Isis ran afoul of the Texas Cosmetology Commission, which began citing her repeatedly for practicing without a license.   Consequently, because of Isis’ relentless and unyielding stance, she became the first and only natural hair care provider to be ‘grandfathered’ by the state of Texas.

The story of her struggle appeared in The Wall Street Journal, The Dallas Morning News, D Magazine, and many other publications across the nation. 

Since that time, and in many ways because of the state’s threat, Isis diversified her business, moving it into the realms of a natural hair care product manufacturer and distributor.


Paraphrasing an ancient quote:

Give a hungry person a fish and they will have food sufficient for a day, but if you teach/train a person how to fish they can feed themselves for a lifetime.

Unfortunately, in these dire economic times, the ability of schools such as ours to find the funding for the training of potential students is a high order.  That is why we are asking for your help in sponsoring the cost of training at The Institute of Ancestral Braiding so that they can become productive and self sufficient, and have the opportunity for gaining lifelong employment skills.

In the state of Texas a natural hair care technician is required by law to be licensed.  A student must complete 35 hours of training in order to receive this license.  Our school offers this course and the necessary training for an individual to become an active member of the natural hair care and beauty industry as a service provider or business owner.  We can provide this training towards licensing. 


What will this money be going towards?

The Leasing and furnishing a facility to house The Institute for Ancestral Braiding. Once completed then have a budget to market the Institute.

We need a modest $125,000 to Lease and furnish a facility to house the Institute. How that breaks down is.

1.) $50,000 to lease a building to house the Institute.

2.) $30,000 for Stylist chairs, Students desks, washbowl stations, Office equipment.

3.) $20,000 for educational supplies, materials, mannequin heads and audio/visual equipment

4.) $25,000 for marketing 


The Impact

The Isis Project realizes that, from a business standpoint, no resource is as important as the human resource.  We believe that the health of the hair is directly connected to the health of the body. As a contributor you can help restore the awareness within people of African descent and people in general  of the cultural art form of properly caring for kinky hair, loving oneself, and embracing an African beauty standard. The knowledge shared is valuable to the world.   Once one decides to change the negative thinking patterns about self image they will start to understand the importance of properly taking care of and nourishing their natural kinky hair instead of placing chemicals in it and damaging it in order to obtain a commercial standard of beauty.

Other Ways You can Help 

In the event that we are not able to raise all the money we need to complete our mission, We will use what funds raised to fund the Lewis and Wood Scholarship fund which provides tuition assistance to those that qualify.

  • In an effort to help many individual who cannot afford the cost of training, but want to excel as productive members of the natural hair/beauty industry-- and, perhaps most importantly, society at large-- we are reaching out to business leaders locally and nationally in hopes that they will join us in our Isis Project Sponsorship Program. Naturally Isis


***TESTIMONIES***

Maati Ra
December 19, 2012 · Edited 
Allowed on Timeline

Natural Hair Stylist Isis Brantley
Is On FIRE
Last weekend, I attended my very first Natural Hair event, at the Nzuri Natural Hair Health and Beauty Festival , December 8, 2012, in Houston, TX.  I noticed a booth with a name above that read, Isis Brantley, which sparked an interest to stop and look. Below was a lady twisting a woman’s hair,  promoting a holistic line of natural hair products. I was very intrigued so I purchased, Lemongrass Shampoo and Tea Tree Skin & Scalp cream. I realized was the lady I was introduce to is known nationwide as Naturally Isis, the guru of Natural Hair Care., Isis Brantley.
Part I - Isis Brantley speaks at Nzuri event in Houston pt 1

Part II - Isis Brantley speaks at Nzuri event in Houston pt 2

Part III - Isis Brantley speaks at Nzuri event in Houston pt 3


Jazmine Jazmine

To Me

Sep 18

Good day Naturallyisis ...Omg! I just rushed to youtube after my daughter showed me her hair in globs in the shower. She just happened to tell me today...however I guess it started just 2 or 3 days after she decided to get a wave noveau. I just tried to contact the stylist and salon she went to and I received a voicemail. I left a message just stating my number and for a call back. My daughter doesn't want me going there upset but I know for my daughter to even tell me and show me the hair...there is(was) a problem but it's so much hair! I'm afraid it's all going to be out within a matter of days or weeks if it's coming out in clumps like this. Omg! She was so happy...her hair had grown in it's natural state so long that she was so happy to get perm(wave noveau) to celebrate the length. Please help me/my daughter. I know this traumatic for her and for me. She tries to be tough but I know this is seriously effected her . 

I put the glob of hair in a ziplock bag and will be adding any more hair that falls out in the meantime. Is there a lawsuit against loreal or carson soft sheen? Please help? I'm still awaiting a call from the stylist to find out if she used the brand products mentioned in your video with the other woman who suffered from this unforturnate situation.

I advised my daughter to email you and she just said 'Mom there's nothing anyone can do' and stop telling everyone. I yelled back to the room to her minutes ago----I'm not telling everyone ..I'm looking for answers ...it's your hair and this lady from what I see in the video is someone who knows what's going on in the industry of Black hair products/damage etc.,

Mzchastang@yahoo.com is her email but I will again try to get her to email you and watch the video..she's just baracaded herself in her room now and I think I feel her pain worse than she. Probably nothing we(she) can do as far as the hair stylist who applied the perm? Please contact me please at  your soonest. Much regards peace respect love & blessings 

Gena 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m_nDUrVT4aE(Preview)


Natural Tresses

November 19 at 12:03pm·

Hi Isis, 

I love how you work with our young girls so that our gift can be shared and passed along to them. Never to be lost! Thanks! I so want to do this with young girls in my community, and I will! Thanks again!


Kaye Grant.
November 9 at 6:35pmviamobile·
I finally found ~My Professional Natural Hair Stylist~ my journey is now over n now I AM SATISFIED!
Y'all check out Ms BeautifulIsis Brantley!!


Douglas John Koree

October 19 at 8:53pmviamobile·

Lookout Natural World!!! I am getting trained by The Best Natural Hair expert in the State of TexasIsis Brantley!!! Come to our school The Institute of Ancestral to receive the best service for your loc care,maintenance & repair!!! Ask for John 214-946-1460 2642 S Beckley Dallas Tx 75224

Charlotte Hicks Todd
UCN supports your struggles in gaining your creativity. Keep doing what you do for the next generation of African American women. Keep teaching and making Black Women and children BEAUTIFUL.
